title: Account Manager till Tele2
description_text:
General Information
Location
Eskilstuna
Job ID
8734
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
English, Swedish
Description & requirements
Description
Vi söker nu en driven och relationsskapande
Account Manager
som vill vara med på vår gemensamma tillväxtresa tillsammans med Tele2.
I rollen får du arbeta med att utveckla och stärka kundrelationer, identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter och bidra till hög kundnöjdhet.
Som Account Manager blir du en viktig länk mellan Tele2 och deras företagskunder med 10-99 anställda . Du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk och resultatorienterad miljö där ditt engagemang och din förmåga att skapa långsiktiga relationer verkligen gör skillnad.
Bli en del av Transcom som Account Manager!
I rollen ansvarar du för att skapa långsiktiga kundrelationer och bidra till tillväxt hos vår kund, Tele2.
Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:
⦁	Bygga och utveckla starka relationer med befintliga och nya kunder
⦁	Identifiera kundbehov och erbjuda lösningar ur Tele2:s breda tjänsteportfölj
⦁	Driva hela säljprocessen – från prospektering till avtal
⦁	Samarbeta nära interna team för att säkerställa bästa möjliga kundupplevelse
⦁	Arbeta mot uppsatta mål och aktivt bidra till teamets framgång
Det här får du hos oss
⦁	En projektanställning på 12 månader med möjlighet till förlängning eller fast anställning
⦁	Möjligheten att representera ett av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken inom telekom
⦁	Attraktiv löneform med både fast lön och provision
⦁	En dynamisk arbetsmiljö med engagerade kollegor och högt tempo
⦁	Löpande kompetensutveckling och stöd i din professionella resa
⦁	Placering: Arbetet utgår från Eskilstuna, men möjlighet finns även för distansarbete eller arbete på annan ort
Vi söker dig som
Du drivs av resultat, har en naturlig känsla för service och trivs i mötet med människor.
Du är kommunikativ och trygg i kunddialoger, oavsett om det handlar om att bygga nya relationer eller utveckla befintliga samarbeten.
För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har:
⦁	Erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning eller account management
⦁	En grundläggande förståelse för telekom- och IT-lösningar – eller en stark vilja att lära dig snabbt
⦁	Förmåga att arbeta proaktivt och målinriktat mot uppsatta mål
⦁	En naturlig förmåga att bygga förtroende och skapa långsiktiga relationer
Så går rekryteringsprocessen till
Är detta nästa steg i din karriär? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – urval sker löpande!
Det här är livet på Transcom
Transcom är en global specialist inom kundservice och kundnöjdhet genom vårt omfattande nätverk av 90 kontaktcenter i 29 länder på 33 språk. Vi drivs av innovation och har en passion för att hjälpa människor att lösa problem. Dessutom är vi en av Sveriges största arbetsgivare för unga människor.
På Transcom är vi engagerade – till våra kunder och varandra. Varje dag börjar någon sin resa med Transcom. Att ta den potential som finns idag och omvandla den till kompetens för framtiden.
Här bryr vi oss om varandra. Du är inkluderad, precis som du är, från dag ett.

title: Accountant
description_text:
General Information
Location
Cairo
Job ID
4426
Job Category
Accounting/Finance
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical
Accountant
to join our finance team. In this role, you will be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, ensuring compliance, and providing the insights necessary to drive our company's financial health. If you are a numbers-driven professional looking to make a tangible impact in a collaborative environment, we want to hear from you.
What's in it for YOU!
Key Responsibilities:
Assist in the preparation of financial reports, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements.
Record, verify, and process financial transactions in accounting software.
Reconcile bank statements and resolve discrepancies in a timely manner.
Support accounts payable and receivable processes by preparing invoices, processing payments, and maintaining accurate records.
Assist with month-end and year-end closing processes.
Maintain organized and up-to-date financial documentation and filing systems.
Prepare and submit tax filings, ensuring compliance with regulations.
Assist with internal and external audits by providing necessary documentation.
Monitor budgets and provide regular updates on financial performance.
Stay updated on accounting standards and best practices to ensure compliance.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
0–2 years of experience in accounting or finance (internships or co-op experiences are a plus).
Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP) and Microsoft Excel.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
High attention to detail and accuracy in work.
Good organizational and time-management skills.
Knowledge of basic accounting principles and relevant laws.
Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
Preferred Skills:
Familiarity with ERP systems.
Experience with preparing tax returns.
Understanding of financial analysis techniques.
What Life at Transcom is like!
Transcom Worldwide is one of the leading global customer experience companies, supplying local and global clients in multiple markets. With our global footprint and forward-leaning customer experience solutions, we serve our clients via different channels like voice, chat, social media, et. "At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together."

description_text:
General Information
Location

Description & requirements
Description
We’re looking for an experienced accounting professional with strong SAP skills and a solid accounting background. If you're detail-oriented, confident in managing receivables, and more importantly - proficient in Excel, join our international team and make an impact in a dynamic finance environment.
Join us as an Accounting Advisor!
Your main responsibilities would be:
Monitoring of receivables management and the due dates of invoices and payment terms in SAP
Allocating of customer payments with related invoices in SAP
Daily checking payments and issuing necessary documents.
Processing credit notes and debit notes
Control of cash allocation and customer settlement for account reconciliation
Control and monitoring of overdue management (dunning process)
Monitoring of weekly internal reports
Researching and investigating discrepancies in invoices to determine the accuracy of charges with related credit notes or claims
Communicating other departments for customer claims and processing necessary documents
Handling customer inquiries regarding billing issues
Managing an Accounts Receivable ledger and Accounts Receivable files
What's in it for YOU?
Permanent employment
with long-term career prospects
Competitive salary
based on experience and expertise
Working hours
09-17h with weekends off
Initial office-based work
in Belgrade, with a
hybrid model available
after onboarding
Structured onboarding
and support from experienced mentors
Opportunities for advancement
in a collaborative international environment
What we expect:
Fluency in German (C1/C2 level) –
essential for communication and documentation
English proficiency –
a valuable asset for international coordination
Prior experience with SAP –
mandatory (ideally in Accounts Receivable and/or Payable)
Strong
accounting background –
with practical knowledge of financial processes and principles

including data analysis, reconciliation tools, and reporting functions

attention to detail

title: Agent für den Bereich der Geschäftskommunikation
description_text:
General Information
Location
Thessaloniki
Job ID
9859
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
German
Description & requirements
Description
Möchtest du Teil eines kleinen, exklusiven Teams sein, in dem Zusammenhalt und Wertschätzung großgeschrieben werden?
Arbeitest du gerne im Homeoffice, legst aber gleichzeitig Wert auf den persönlichen Austausch mit deinen Kolleg:innen?
Dann bist du bei uns, der Transcom, genau richtig!
Das kannst du von uns erwarten:
Freue dich auf ein überdurchschnittliches Bruttomonatsgehalt von 1.150 € (14 Monatsgehälter), einen Bonus von bis zu 450 € und eine Internetpauschale von bis zu 23 €.
Wir freuen uns, dir einen zusätzlichen Willkommensbonus von insgesamt 300 € anzubieten. Du erhältst 150 € nach deinem dritten Monat und weitere 150 € nach deinem sechsten Monat bei uns.
Einstieg am 02.02.26
Darüber hinaus erhältst du einen steuerfreien Einkaufsgutschein im Wert von 132 €.
Du profitierst von festen Arbeitszeiten (Montag-Freitag von 09:00 bis 17:30 Uhr) und hast freie Wochenenden. Zusätzlich sind deutsche Feiertage frei!
Wir bieten dir eine umfassende Krankenversicherung sowie attraktive Sozialleistungen.
Wir wollen, dass du gut arbeiten kannst und stellen dafür das nötige Equipment.
Wir sind für dich da! Zu jeder Zeit ist ein Ansprechpartner für dich erreichbar, egal ob es eine Frage zum Projekt oder zu deinem Dienstplan oder einfach nur um ein offenes Ohr geht.
Genieße ein hybrides Arbeitsmodell mit der Flexibilität, nach der Schulung im Homeoffice oder Büro zu arbeiten.
Wir bieten eine bezahlte und praxisorientierte Intensivschulung und arbeitsbegleitende Betreuung.
Werde Agent für den Bereich der Geschäftskommunikation (m/w/d) bei uns!
Als Kundenbetreuer im Outbound kontaktierst du Unternehmen aktiv telefonisch und per E-Mail. Du analysierst den individuellen Bedarf der Geschäftskunden, erfasst relevante Unternehmensinformationen und präsentierst passende Dienstleistungen sowie Paketlösungen von DHL. Dabei passt du Angebote gezielt an die Anforderungen der Unternehmen an und begleitest den Prozess von der ersten Kontaktaufnahme bis zum Abschluss.
Das sind deine Aufgaben:
Du nimmst proaktiv Kontakt zu Unternehmen auf - sowohl telefonisch als auch per E-Mail - und gehst dabei gezielt auf deren individuelle Wünsche ein.
Du führst strukturierte Gespräche zur Bedarfsermittlung und erfasst relevante Informationen zum Unternehmensprofil.
Du berätst Unternehmen professionell zu den Dienstleistungen und Paketlösungen von DHL.
Du präsentierst maßgeschneiderte Angebote und passt diese gezielt an die Bedürfnisse der jeweiligen Unternehmen an.
Du begleitest den gesamten Kommunikationsprozess von der ersten Kontaktaufnahme bis zum Abschluss.
Du dokumentierst Gesprächsergebnisse sorgfältig im System.
Du baust nachhaltige Kundenbeziehungen auf und pflegst bestehende Geschäftskontakte.
Du arbeitest eng mit internen Teams zusammen, um optimale Lösungen für die Kunden sicherzustellen
Das bist du:
Du verfügst über gute Deutsch- und MS- Office Kenntnisse
Du hast eine positive Einstellung und lebst den Servicegedanken.
Du kannst dich gut auf Menschen einstellen und zeigst dabei Fingerspitzengefühl.
Du kannst überzeugen und weißt dich gut auszudrücken.
Du scheust keine Herausforderungen und hast Lust auf etwas Neues.
Du bringst Erfahrung im Kundenservice mit und hast mindestens ein Jahr in einem Callcenter gearbeitet.
Du bist ein Teamplayer und stets hilfsbereit.
Du interessierst dich für einen Einsatz im Homeoffice und vor Ort und bringst die notwendige Eigenständigkeit mit.
Du möchtest 40 Stunden in der Woche arbeiten.
Über Transcom:
Transcom ist ein Spezialist für Kundenerlebnisse, der seinen Auftraggebern Kundenservice, Vertrieb, technischen Support und Finanzdienstleistungen anbietet - ermöglicht durch unser umfangreiches Netzwerk aus Contact Centern und Heimarbeitern. Wir sind 30.000 Spezialisten für Kundenerlebnisse, verteilt auf 90 Contact Center in 29 Ländern und bieten Kundenservicedienstleistungen in 33 Sprachen für internationale Marken verschiedenster Branchen an.
Bei Transcom sind wir unermüdlich engagiert unseren Mitarbeitern und Kunden jeden Tag ein gutes Gefühl zu geben. Wir wollen dein Potential von heute, mit dir gemeinsam, für deine erfolgreiche Zukunft weiterentwickeln. Teamgeist und gegenseitige Unterstützung werden bei uns GROß geschrieben! Und das vom ersten Tag an. Denn nur gemeinsam können wir erfolgreich sein.
Fühlst du dich angesprochen oder hast Rückfragen? Wir stehen dir unter +306956666490 gerne zur Verfügung.
Das ist Transcom! Wir freuen uns auf Dich

Description

Možeš koristiti i vežbati strani jezik uz pružanje podrške na tom jeziku korisnicima naših klijenata koji dolaze iz različitih industrija kao što su moda, bela tehnika, bankarstvo i drugo, i razvijati se u našoj kompaniji.
Šta je tu za TEBE?
plaćena obuka na početku rada

privatno zdravstveno osiguranje
mogućnost korišćenja benefita u rekreativnim objektima
kompanijski Wellness program koji će ti pomoći da se ocećaš bolje i produktivnije na poslu
mogućnost napredovanja i izgradnje karijere u međunarodnom okruženju

komunikacija sa korisnicima na stranom jeziku putem telefona, email-a ili chat-a

Idealan kandidat uživa u pružanju podrške i pomaganju drugim ljudima, otvoren je i fokusiran na zadovoljstvo korisnika i odlično koristi, usmeno i pismeno, na minimum nivou B2/C1, neki od sledećih jezika:
nemački
francuski
engleski
španski
italijanski
švedski
norveški
danski
ruski
hrvatski
grčki
poljski
slovenački
portugalski
finski
holandski
hebrejski
slovački
češki
madjarski
Osim poznavanja jezika, potrebno je da poseduješ:
osnovno zanje i korišćenje računara i MS Office paketa
izvrsne komunikacijske i interakcijske veštine
razvijenu pismenu i usmenu komunikaciju
samostalnost, motivisanost, organizovanost i otvorenost
Kako izgleda život u Transcomu?
U Transcomu smo neumorno posvećeni. Našim klijentima i jedni drugima. Svakog dana neko započne svoje putovanje sa Transcomom. Uzimajući potencijal koji imaju danas i pretvarajući ga u veštine za budućnost. Dobijanje priznanja za naporan rad, timskog igrača i podršku drugima. Zagovaranje pozitivnih, trajnih promena u svojim timovima i zajednicama. Takvi smo mi u Transcomu. Ovde nam je stalo, i navijamo jedni za druge. Uključeni ste, baš takvi kakvi jeste, od prvog dana. title: Agent Relation client FR-ENG (location de voitures)
description_text:
General Information
Location
Lac
Job ID
9712
Job Category
Agent
Language Requirement
English, French
Description & requirements
Description
Chez Transcom, nous sommes des passionnés de l’expérience client (CX). Nous sommes aussi dévoués à nos clients que leurs propres fans le sont. C’est pourquoi les plus grandes marques mondiales de mobilité et de voyage nous font confiance. Aujourd'hui, nous recherchons un
Conseiller Clientèle bilingue
(Français/Anglais) dynamique, prêt à accompagner nos clients sur la route et à leur offrir un service d'exception. Et nous voulons que vous fassiez partie de l'aventure !
Ce que nous vous offrons :
Un environnement international et inclusif : où vous vous sentirez soutenu et accueilli dès le premier jour ;
Un développement continu : via nos plateformes d'apprentissage internes et des formations externes ;
Des opportunités de croissance infinies : 90 % de nos leaders ont commencé leur carrière en tant que conseillers ;
Une formation initiale de 5 semaines : un programme complet pour maîtriser les systèmes de réservation, la gestion de flotte et les standards de qualité ;
Des bureaux modernes et confortables : avec des espaces de détente pour vos pauses ;
Un emploi du temps flexible ;
Transport pris en charge : Taxis gratuits pour les shifts se terminant entre 19h00 et 23h00 ;
Avantages corporatifs et réductions.
Rejoignez Transcom en tant que Conseiller Clientèle Bilingue !
Soyez le moteur de la satisfaction client et facilitez la mobilité de milliers d'utilisateurs. Dans ce rôle en réception d'appels, vous devrez :
Travailler pour une agence de location de voitures de premier plan, en accompagnant les clients internationaux dans leurs besoins de mobilité (réservations, modifications, assistance) ;
Offrir une assistance bilingue de haute qualité (Français et Anglais) en répondant aux appels de manière professionnelle, chaleureuse et efficace ;
Gérer des situations variées : de la prise de réservation à la gestion des contrats, en passant par le support logistique et la résolution de problèmes ;
Contribuer au succès du projet, proposer des améliorations sur les processus et partager vos connaissances avec votre équipe ;
Travailler selon des horaires rotatifs.

title: Agent/ica u odjelu teleprodaje
description_text:
General Information
Location
Osijek
Job ID
9837
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Croatian
Description & requirements
Description
Ovo je posao za sve koji su spremni učiti i rasti, a mi smo tu da pružimo početnu obuku i kontinuiranu podršku na tom putu. Bez obzira jesi li tek na početku karijere ili tražiš novi izazov, kod nas ćeš naći priliku za ostvarenje svojih profesionalnih ciljeva te pritom biti nagrađen/a za svaki uspjeh koji ostvariš.
Što je tu za TEBE?
Početna obuka i podrška:
Osiguravamo da svaki novi član tima dobije sve potrebne alate i znanje kako bi se uspješno integrirao i ostvarivao željene rezultate.
Nagrađivanje:
Tvoj trud i doprinos bit će prepoznati i nagrađeni. Osim redovne plaće, nudimo atraktivne prodajne bonuse i nenovčane nagrade kako bi te dodatno motivirali za ostvarivanje uspjeha.
Različite mogućnosti rada
: Omogućavamo opcije punog ili nepunog radnog vremena te opciju rada na studentski ugovor
Razvojni put:
Nudimo svakom pojedincu priliku za napredovanje i rast unutar tvrtke.
Balansiranje privatnog i poslovnog života
: Važno nam je da naši zaposlenici imaju ravnotežu između obveza na poslu i slobodnog vremena te stoga na ovom projektu nudimo rad u prvoj smjeni svima koji to žele, kao i fleksibilnost u odabiru smjena, slobodne vikende i neradne blagdane.
Prijateljska atmosfera i timski duh
: Radimo zajedno kao tim, podržavamo jedni druge i slavimo uspjehe zajedno.
Pridruži nam se kao
Agent/ica u odjelu teleprodaje na hrvatskom jeziku!
Ovaj odjel može se pohvaliti timskim i natjecateljskim duhom, odličnim kolegama, fleksibilnosti te izvrsnim rezultatima, a od prvog dana svim novim kolegama možemo obećati sljedeće:
posao ćeš započeti obukom na kojoj ćeš se upoznati s jednostavnim sustavom i procesima uz podršku naših voditelja timova i trenera
komunicirat ćeš i prodavati najbolje telekomunikacijske pakete na tržištu što će ti omogućiti ostvarivanje realno postavljenih ciljeva
pružat ćeš informacije postojećim i potencijalnim korisnicima našeg klijenta i imati minimalno administrativnog posla
Što tražimo?
orijentiranost na ostvarivanje rezultata (iskustvo u prodaji je prednost, ali ne i uvjet)
osnovno korištenje MS Office paketa
pozitivan stav, otvorenost u komunikaciji, aktivno slušanje
samostalnost, visoku motiviranost za napredak u karijeri
spremnost na rad iz ureda
hrvatski jezik (nivo izvornog govornika)
Kako je raditi u Transcomu?
U Transcomu smo neumorno predani našim klijentima i jedni drugima. Svakog dana netko započne svoje putovanje s Transcomom. Njegujući potencijal koji imaju danas, pretvaraju ga u vještine za budućnost. Prepoznajemo trud, timski rad i spremnost na pomoć drugima. Potičemo dugoročne pozitivne promjene u svojim timovima i zajednici. Takvi smo u Transcomu. Ovdje brinemo i navijamo jedni za druge. Prihvaćamo vas baš takve kakvi jeste, od prvog dana. title: Agents relation client-français (transport de colis)  - 1
description_text:
General Information
Location
Cun
Job ID
9799
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
French
Description & requirements
Description
Chez Transcom, nous sommes des passionnés de l’expérience client (CX). Nous sommes aussi dévoués à nos clients que leurs propres fans le sont. C’est pourquoi les leaders mondiaux de la logistique et de la livraison express nous font confiance. Nous sommes le moteur de l'excellence pour des géants du transport de colis et du e-commerce mondial. Aujourd'hui, nous recherchons un
Conseiller Clientèle francophone
dynamique, capable de résoudre des défis logistiques avec rapidité et empathie.
Ce que nous vous offrons :
Un environnement international et inclusif :
où vous vous sentirez soutenu, encouragé et accueilli dès le premier jour ;
Un développement continu :
via nos plateformes d'apprentissage internes spécialisées dans la chaîne logistique ;
Des opportunités de croissance infinies :
90 % de nos managers et dirigeants ont commencé leur carrière en tant que conseillers clientèle ;
Une formation initiale complète :
un programme pour maîtriser les outils de tracking (suivi), les procédures douanières de base et les logiciels de gestion de transport (TMS) ;
Des bureaux modernes et confortables :
avec des espaces de détente pour vos pauses ;
Un emploi du temps flexible ;
Transport pris en charge :
Taxis gratuits pour les shifts se terminant entre 19h00 et 23h00 ;
Avantages corporatifs et réductions.
Rejoignez Transcom en tant que Conseiller Clientèle Transport !
Soyez au cœur de la chaîne d'approvisionnement mondiale et accomplissez un travail ayant un impact concret sur la vie des gens : s'assurer que chaque colis arrive à bon port. Dans ce rôle, vous devrez :
Accompagner les clients
(particuliers et professionnels) dans le suivi de leurs expéditions nationales et internationales ;
Offrir une assistance réactive
en réception d'appels ou via chat pour résoudre les incidents de livraison (retards, colis endommagés, erreurs d'adresse) ;
Gérer des situations variées :
enquêtes auprès des transporteurs, modifications de créneaux de livraison, et déblocage de situations douanières simples ;
Travailler en coordination
avec les entrepôts et les chauffeurs pour garantir une satisfaction client optimale ;
Contribuer au succès du projet
en proposant des idées pour fluidifier le parcours du colis ;
Travailler selon des horaires rotatifs.

title: Apoio ao Cliente (M/F) Porto
description_text:
General Information
Location
Porto
Job ID
9793
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Portuguese
Description & requirements
Description
És uma pessoa comunicativa, com interesse pelo setor financeiro e vertente comercial?
Na Transcom estamos à procura de Especialistas em Apoio ao Cliente motivados para se juntarem à nossa equipa no Porto. Se gostas de ajudar clientes e procuras uma oportunidade estável, com formação contínua e possibilidade de crescimento, esta vaga é para ti.
O que te ofrecemos
:
Formação paga para te prepararmos para o sucesso desde o primeiro dia;
Horário de segunda a sábado (folga domingo + 1 dia útil).
Ambiente de trabalho presencial e colaborativo no centro do Porto;
Plano de carreira real, com oportunidades de progressão interna
Trabalhar num projeto de referência no setor financeiro;
Forte investimento a nível de prospeção seguros.
Apoio constante e uma equipa que valoriza o teu desenvolvimento.
Junta-te a nós como Especialista em Apoio ao Cliente:
Aqui, serás responsável por apoiar clientes no setor financeiro, garantindo um atendimento de excelência, empático e orientado para a solução.
As tuas responsabilidades incluirão:
Prestar apoio ao cliente por telefone, e-mail ou chat de forma clara e profissional
Esclarecimento de dúvidas
Registar interações e atualizar dados de forma rigorosa nos sistemas internos
Cumprir os procedimentos operacionais e de compliance
Cross selling e up selling em todas as chamadas.
Requisitos:
Nativo em Português de Portugal;
Afinidade com o setor financeiro (experiência anterior valorizada);
Disponibilidade para trabalhar presencialmente no Porto;
Disponibilidade para trabalhar em regime de turnos rotativos (08h00 - 20h00);
Excelente capacidade de comunicação e escuta ativa;
Orientação para o cliente e resolução de problemas;
Espírito de equipa e compromisso com qualidade.
Como é a vida na Transcom?
A Transcom é uma multinacional global especializada na experiência do cliente que presta serviços de consultoria, atendimento ao cliente, vendas, apoio técnico e cobranças através da nossa extensa rede de centros de contacto e agentes em regime remoto.
Somos 30 000 especialistas em experiência ao cliente em mais de +85 centros de contacto em 29 países. Prestamos serviços em 33 línguas a marcas globais numa alta variedade de mercados.
Todos os dias alguém começa a sua viagem com a Transcom, aproveitando o potencial atual e transformando-o em competências para o futuro. Aqui somos reconhecidos por trabalhar em equipa e por nos apoiarmos mutuamente. Defendemos uma mudança positiva e duradoura nas nossas equipas e comunidade.
Aqui preocupamo-nos e apoiamo-nos uns aos outros. És aceite tal como és, desde o primeiro dia. E, com a mentalidade correta, não existe limite até onde podemos ir juntos.

title: Apoio ao Cliente (Remoto) - Mercado Português

metadata.Description: Gosta de tecnologia e de ajudar clientes a resolver problemas? A Transcom está à procura de um/a Customer Service Representative que fale Português nativo para apoiar uma marca líder global no setor dos eletrodomésticos. Nesta função, irá prestar principalmente apoio ao cliente inbound e suporte de backoffice, identificando também oportunidades comerciais sempre que fizer sentido. Interessado/a? Estamos à espera da sua candidatura! O que temos para si! Ambiente internacional e inclusivo; Formação inicial totalmente paga para o preparar para a função; Desenvolvimento contínuo através de plataformas internas de aprendizagem; Programa de recomendação de colaboradores com bónus; Benefícios e descontos corporativos; Regime remoto após um período inicial presencial (5 dias); Necessário residir num raio de 50 km de Braga, onde decorrerá a formação inicial. Junte-se à Transcom como Customer Service Representative! Irá integrar uma equipa dedicada ao apoio de uma das marcas mais reconhecidas no setor dos eletrodomésticos. No seu dia a dia, será responsável por: Atender contactos inbound de clientes por telefone, chat e email; Gerir tarefas de backoffice, como tickets e pedidos; Esclarecer dúvidas, resolver problemas e reclamações relacionadas com eletrodomésticos; Prestar informação clara, precisa e empática; Identificar oportunidades para apresentar garantias ou extensões de garantia no final de cada interação; Contribuir tanto para a satisfação do cliente como para o desempenho comercial. O que procuramos? Fluência em Português oral e escrita; Boas competências de comunicação e relacionamento interpessoal; Orientação para o cliente com sensibilidade comercial; Bons conhecimentos informáticos; Capacidade para gerir várias tarefas num ambiente dinâmico; Disponibilidade para trabalhar de segunda a sexta-feira, em turnos rotativos entre as 08h00 e as 20h00; Para trabalhares em casa, precisarás de assegurar: Ligação à internet estável de, pelo menos, 10 Mbps. O que é a vida na Transcom! Na Transcom, estamos totalmente comprometidos — com os nossos clientes e uns com os outros. Todos os dias, alguém começa a sua jornada na Transcom, transformando o potencial que tem hoje em competências para o futuro. Reconhecemos o esforço, o espírito de equipa e o apoio mútuo. Defendemos uma mudança positiva e duradoura nas nossas equipas e comunidades. É assim que somos na Transcom: aqui cuidamos e apoiamo-nos uns aos outros. És incluído/a tal como és, desde o primeiro dia. E com a atitude certa, não há limites para onde podemos ir juntos.

title: Business Analyst
description_text:
General Information
Location
Cairo
Job ID
9326
Job Category
Operations
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is all about people, and we’re looking for a
Business Analyst
to support our team and help create a workplace where everyone thrives.
Join our Transcom Family as a
Business Analyst
!
We are looking for an exceptional Business Analyst to join our team in the 5th Settlement! If you're a data wizard who can transform complex numbers into actionable business insights, we want to talk to you.
This role is critical for driving operational efficiency and improving customer experience by leveraging deep data analysis and root cause identification.
Key Responsibilities
Performance Analysis & Insight Generation:
Conduct deep-dive analysis on performance metrics, including CSAT, AHT, and Service Level, to identify trends, variances, and performance gaps.
Perform root cause analysis on underperforming KPIs and provide data-backed recommendations for operational improvements.
Verify the compliance of the implemented solutions with the analyzed requirements
Reporting & Dashboard Development:
Design, develop, and maintain interactive dashboards and reports (Looker Studio) that clearly visualize performance attributes.
Ensure all reporting is accurate, timely, and aligned with stakeholder needs, providing daily, weekly, and monthly operational views.
Present key findings and strategic insights to senior management, translating complex data analysis into clear, business-focused narratives.
Validate the accuracy and integrity of data sources used for all performance reporting.
Preparing needed business reviews and reports.
Financial & Resource Calibration:
Analyze and report on financials, including cost, utilization rates, and operational expenditures.
Develop and track the financial impact of proposed process and performance improvements.
What We're Looking For:
Advanced Excel Mastery: You must be highly proficient with Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, Nested Formulas (IF/AND/OR), and Conditional Formatting to handle large, complex datasets quickly.
Data Transformation: A proven ability to clean, structure, and ready raw, messy system exports for analysis. Experience with Power Query is a significant plus.
Dynamic Dashboarding: Hands-on experience creating compelling, interactive visual reports (Charts, Slicers, Trend Lines) using both Excel and Looker Data Studio (or similar tools like Power BI/Tableau).
Metric Fluency: A deep understanding and ability to analyze key operational metrics, including:
-AHT (Average Handle Time)
-ART (Average Response Time)
-CSAT (Customer Satisfaction)
-Concurrency
Root Cause Analysis & Insight Delivery: You don't just report "what" happened; you find the "why." You must be able to identify correlations (e.g., low CSAT correlated with high Response Time), deliver insightful recommendations, and drive operational improvements.
Executive-Level Presentation: Ability to synthesize complex data into clear, concise, and professional "Executive Summary" style PowerPoint slides for senior leadership.
Trend Identification: A sharp eye for spotting outlier performance among specific agents or within certain timeframes.
What's in it for YOU!
International and inclusive environment, that makes you feel supported, encouraged, and welcome from day one;
Continuous development.
Endless growth opportunities.
Modern and comfortable office and relaxing spaces to take a break;
Flexible work schedule;
Life-work balance;
What Life at Transcom is like!
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
“We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.”

Description
Transcom is looking for talented individuals like you to join our awesome team! Be the next

Pasig
site.

Business Intelligence & Reporting
Supervisor!
The BI&R Supervisor is responsible for supporting the day-to-day reports processing of the Reports Analyst/s. Timeliness of delivery, accuracy and integrity of published reports are key metrics to be observed by this role, alongside mentoring and performance management of Reports Analysts. This role is also expected to participate
on reporting projects, build or develop dashboard for operations, and educate the users on the use and
navigation of published reports.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Reporting & Analysis
▪
Maintenance of all external, internal and ad hoc reports as required – Daily / Weekly / Monthly
▪
Creating all reports and initial analysis of variance;
▪
Verify the accuracy of sources and formulae;
▪
Verify reports in terms of plausibility;
▪
Consolidate information into a manageable format;
▪
Continuously monitors the accuracy and integrity of all data that is published in any report.
▪
Provide the business the analytics needed to improve operational performance
Reports Portfolio
Management
Maintains 	consistent communication to enhance the support experience.
Consistently 	demonstrates sound judgement.
Provide 	input to business requirements and functional specifications for the 	design and implementation of solution.
Design 	standard suite of reports/dashboards that will equip the 	organization with access to timely data and business insights which 	will help them
make faster and more accurate decisions.
Continuously 	review the design and content of existing suite of reports to ensure 	they stay contemporary.
Work 	with BI Production team to deliver newly designed 	reports/dashboards, through proper hand-over with comprehensive work 	instructions and training.
Register 	new reports in the reports master list.
Conduct 	semi-annual clean-up of existing report portfolio. Discontinue 	reports that are no longer used by the business and update the 	reports master list.
Process Management
& Support

Provide 	support as required to ensure the availability and performance of 	developed reports and dashboards for both external and internal 	users.
Provide 	technical assistance to his audience/s.
Alerts 	managers, as appropriate, when issues arise.
Assists 	in implementing and maintaining operational processes to ensure 	compliance to Company policies, legal requirements and regulatory 	mandates.
Manage 	a group of Reports Analysts and/or Senior Reports Analysts assigned 	to work on various campaigns
Guide, 	mentor and train Reports Analysts and/or Senior Reports Analysts.
Partnered 	with leadership to drive employee engagement strategies, ensuring a 	cohesive and motivated team environment
What we are looking for:
To be successful in this role you must…
Educational Background:
- Preferably college graduate of a technical or business course and from a reputable institution.

-
Minimum of 5 years of Contact Center experience.
-
At least 3 years related experience in BPO reporting.
-
Had prior experience managing a small group of Reports Analysts.
-
Proficiency with Google Suite applications.
- Expert on using MS Excel, VBA Macro and charting principles.
- Performance tuning experience related to reporting queries required.
- Excellent interpersonal (verbal and written) communication skills are required to support working in project environments that includes internal, external and
customer teams.
- Requires strong analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilities.
-
Ability to manage multiple priorities, and assess and adjust quickly to changing priorities.
- Requires 	leadership qualities to mentor junior members of the team.

Meal & Transportation Allowance
Rice Subsidy
Clothing Allowance
24/7 Teleconsult

In-house & Online Pharmacy
Scholarship Program
Retirement Fund

Accidental & Life Insurance
Free Shuttle Service

Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. description_text:
General Information
Location
Belgrade
Job ID
8671
Job Category
Operations Leadership
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
We are currently looking for a new colleague who is going to be in charge of the profitability and growth of his/her business unit by steering on employee performance management, service quality and client interaction.
The position is open for following locations:
Belgrade, Zagreb or Skopje.
Join us as a  Business Manager!
As Business Manager at Transcom you would:
Build trust with the client, always deliver amazing client meetings
Empower and coach your team leaders to build world class teams
Collaborate and plan operation with account RTM and TQM
Control, monitor, report on and analyse the KPIs, contributing proposed new business strategies, establishing viable budgets and performing on-going financial monitoring
Ensure high employee satisfaction by building trust in the team
Have a good understanding of pricing structure and profitability targets, and how you can impact them
Ensure a smooth and profitable operation
Ensure that targets are set for each employee and empower the team members to outperform
Assess and manage the performance of his/her collaborators, in line with Company policies and performance management procedures and processes

Opportunity to further develop your skills and career in a highly dynamic international team
The challenge to lift your own department to a higher level in a creative way
The opportunity to enrich the quality of the project with your experience
A positive working atmosphere and the freedom to act independently
Attractive salary
Private health insurance
Permanent work contract

You have:
3+ years of experience in customer service and contact center support
Minimum of 2 years of experience in leading teams with more complex structure
Experience in leading a contact center
Strong leadership and management skills
Advanced knowledge of written and spoken (Business) English

Someone who takes ownership and pride in the success of their work
Analytical and a problem solver

description_text:
General Information
Location

Job ID

Job Category

Language Requirement
Italian
Description & requirements
Description
Sei pronto/a ad entrare in una nuova azienda e provare una nuova opportunità? Se stai cercando un lavoro sfidante e con ottime possibilità di crescita professionale questa è la tua entusiasmante opportunità in questo business dinamico e di rapida crescita!
Cosa offriamo
Contesto internazionale ed ambiente lavorativo dinamico e positivo.
Contratto di Collaborazione Coordinata e Continuativa.
Extra Bonus
Assicurazione Sanitaria Integrativa
Possibilità di lavorare in fasce orarie flessibili, dal lunedì a venerdì dalle 9:0 alle 19.00
Possibilità di alternare work at home/work at office
Unisciti alla nostra famiglia Transcom nel ruolo di Collaboratore in attività finanziaria.
Il Consulente finanziario ha il compito di gestire un gruppo di già Clienti attraverso la promozione telefonica (outbound) di prodotti relativi al settore banking/carte di credito.
Qualifiche e Capacità
Diploma di scuola media superiore o equivalente.
Titolo preferenziale certificazione IVASS/OAM
Buona/ottima conoscenza degli strumenti informatici (applicativi, pacchetto Office (Word/Excel/PowerPoint).
Forte skill di vendita e propensione al cliente.
Esperienza pregressa in ambito outbound è un vantaggio.
Alta motivazione personale.
Persona brillante, dinamica e propositiva con spiccate capacità relazionali.
Predisposizione al rapporto interpersonale.
Ottime capacità comunicative ed espositive.
Buona capacità di svolgere la propria prestazione in piena autonomia esecutiva, gestionale, organizzativa ed operativa.
Attitudine al lavoro per "obiettivi".
Informazioni su Transcom
Transcom è una delle principali società globali di customer experience e fornisce servizi di assistenza clienti, vendita, supporto tecnico e gestione del credito attraverso la nostra vasta rete di contact center e operatori in work-at-home. Siamo 30.000 specialisti customer experience in 90 contact center in 29 paesi, fornendo servizi in 33 lingue a marchi internazionali in vari settori verticali. In Transcom prendiamo sul serio gli impegni verso i clienti e verso noi stessi. Ogni giorno accogliamo nuovi talenti, coltiviamo il loro potenziale per far fronte alle skills del futuro. Siamo instancabili, amiamo il gioco di squadra e ci supportiamo l'un l'altro. Inguaribili ottimisti, promuoviamo il cambiamento nei team e nelle comunità in cui operiamo. In Transcom siamo così. Sei benvenuto, sin dal primo istante, così come sei. Non c'è limite a ciò che possiamo costruire insieme.
Suona interessante !? Allora ci piacerebbe avere tue notizie!
Il presente annuncio è rivolto a candidati di ambo i sessi (L. 903/77)
I dati personali presenti nel curriculum saranno trattati nel rispetto del Regolamento UE 2016/679 (GDPR) e del D.Lgs. 196/2003 e successive modifiche, per la gestione e la selezione del personale. L'interessato può esercitare i propri diritti ai sensi degli articoli 15-22 del GDPR.

title: CSR - Spanish Market

metadata.Description: ¿Te gusta la tecnología y ayudar a los clientes a resolver problemas? Transcom está buscando un/a Customer Service Representative con Español para apoyar una marca líder mundial en el sector de los electrodomésticos. En este puesto, ofrecerás principalmente atención al cliente inbound y soporte de backoffice, además de identificar oportunidades comerciales cuando sea relevante. ¿Te interesa? ¡Estamos deseando recibir tu candidatura! ¿Qué hay para ti? Entorno internacional e inclusivo, con apoyo desde el primer día; Formación inicial totalmente pagada para prepararte para el puesto; Desarrollo continuo a través de plataformas internas de aprendizaje; Programa de recomendación de empleados con bonificaciones; Beneficios corporativos y descuentos; Puesto remoto después de un periodo inicial presencial (5 días); Es necesario residir en un radio de 50 km de Braga, donde se realizará la formación inicial. Únete a Transcom como Customer Service Representative Formarás parte de un equipo que da soporte a una de las marcas más reconocidas del sector de los electrodomésticos. En tu día a día, te encargarás de: Atender contactos inbound de clientes por teléfono, chat y email; Gestionar tareas de backoffice, como tickets y solicitudes; Resolver dudas, incidencias y reclamaciones relacionadas con electrodomésticos; Proporcionar información clara, precisa y empática; Identificar oportunidades para presentar garantías o extensiones de garantía al final de cada interacción; Contribuir tanto a la satisfacción del cliente como al rendimiento comercial. Para tener éxito en este puesto, se necesita: Nivel fluido de Español hablado y escrito; Buenas habilidades de comunicación e interpersonales; Orientación al cliente con sensibilidad comercial; Buen manejo de herramientas informáticas; Capacidad para gestionar varias tareas en un entorno dinámico; Disponibilidad para trabajar de lunes a viernes, en turnos rotativos entre las 07:00 y las 19:00; Conexión a internet estable de al menos 10 Mbps. ¿Cómo es la vida en Transcom? En Transcom estamos totalmente comprometidos, con nuestros clientes y entre nosotros. Cada día, alguien comienza su camino en Transcom, transformando el potencial que tiene hoy en habilidades para el futuro. Reconocemos el esfuerzo, el trabajo en equipo y el apoyo mutuo. Impulsamos cambios positivos y duraderos en nuestros equipos y comunidades. Así es como somos en Transcom: aquí nos cuidamos y nos apoyamos unos a otros. Estás incluido/a tal y como eres, desde el primer día. Y con la actitud adecuada, no hay límites hasta dónde podemos llegar juntos.

Description
We are seeking a dedicated and customer-focused Chat Agent to join our customer support team. Your primary goal will be to provide excellent customer service and resolve customer inquiries and issues in real-time.

Engage with customers through online chat and messaging platforms, responding to inquiries, providing information, and offering assistance.
Assist customers in navigating our products or services, addressing their questions, concerns, and technical issues.
Troubleshoot and resolve customer problems, escalating complex issues to higher levels of support when necessary.
Maintain a high level of professionalism and customer service etiquette in all interactions.
Document customer interactions, including the nature of inquiries, solutions provided, and any follow-up actions.
Meet or exceed performance targets, including response time, customer satisfaction scores, and chat volume goals.
Stay updated on product knowledge and company policies to provide accurate and up-to-date information to customers.
Collaborate with team members and other departments to ensure consistent and effective customer support.

title: Customer Service Representative - Hybrid - Greenville, SC
description_text:
General Information
Location
Greenville, SC
Job ID
9427
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Do you have a passion for serving customers?
Are you an expert in customer service and motivated to make a difference in the lives of others?
Our representatives come from a diverse range of backgrounds, but share a passion for serving our client's customers with their diabetes care devices. If you are an expert in customer service and motivated to make a difference in the lives of others, this is the opportunity for you!
What's in it for YOU!
$17.00 per hour, starting pay rate
Monthly performance-based incentives, potential
Onsite in our Greenville, SC office, and then move to Hybrid from your Home Office (based on performance)
Comfortable, climate-controlled office environment (no more being on your feet all day!)
Shifts end by 8:00pm ET
Paid Vacation
Pay options to meet your needs: Daily Pay, Bi-Weekly Pay, Direct Deposit, and Pay Cards
Health Benefits for you and your family, including medical, dental, vision
401(k) Investment options with employer match opportunities
Employee Assistance Program
Ability to develop your skills and grow your career
An opportunity to work for a company passionate about people
Career advancement
Join our Transcom Family as a Customer Service Representative at our Greenville, SC location!
In this full-time employee role, you’ll support our client’s customers with their diabetes care devices. You'll help with technical issues, ordering supplies, insurance questions, and general product support, This role requires patience, empathy, and the ability to communicate clearly while handling multiple systems and tasks.
What we are looking for:
We’ve got an exciting career opportunity for you, if you can:
Effortlessly engage with callers, actively listen, analyze, and isolate tech issues
Provide patience and empathy to callers that need support with time sensitive technical issues
Provide patience and empathy to callers that need support with purchasing or obtaining their diabetes care device
Comfortably navigate multiple applications to research solutions
Multitask in systems while patiently providing step-by-step instructions with a focus on accuracy and timeliness
Calmly provide conflict resolution and navigate frustrated customer situations with an aptitude for service-orientation and social perceptiveness
Work independently with discipline and motivation to succeed in a call center environment where you work both onsite and hybrid from the comfort of your home
Work in a highly structured environment with strict adherence to your assigned full-time schedule taking high-volume inbound calls from customers
Work at a desk, wearing an approved wired headset for the duration of a full-time schedule in order to talk to customers in a high-volume, fast-paced, and sometimes stressful environment
Requirements
The following items are mandatory pre-employment requirements and/or skills that are required to be successful in this role. The skills listed are skills that must be used daily and for a prolonged period of time, up to the full duration of your scheduled shift.
At least 18 years or older
High School Diploma, or equivalent
Able to successfully pass a criminal background check
Reasonable driving distance to the Greenville, SC site
Able to work onsite initially, and then move to a hybrid schedule, based on performance
Able to work a full-time work week, with overtime opportunities, as needed
Able to maintain 100% strict adherence to the assigned schedule
Able to work a variety of shifts influenced by current business needs (including evenings, weekends, and holidays)
Able to work full-time hours, with reliable attendance, as outlined in the assigned schedule
Strong computer knowledge, including ability to accurately type at least 30 wpm
Excellent English written and verbal communication skills
Courteous and friendly with a high level of professionalism
Willingness to follow procedures and adhere to policies
Able to communicate information and ideas so others will understand and able to exchange accurate information in these situations
Able to multitask applications while talking to customers on the phone
Able to thrive in a fast-paced, time-pressured, dynamic work environment taking back-to-back calls
Able to actively listen to customer needs and demonstrate empathy - this includes having problem sensitivity - solve customer problems and be sensitive to others while doing it
Highly adept at working with a high frequency of conflict situations, as well as upset customers
Ability to work in an environment where you must sit, reach, communicate (verbally and electronically), type, read, multitask, and concentrate in a prolonged setting
Able to use your hands to handle, control, or feel objects, tools, or controls
Previous call center experience, preferred
Experience in a technical support role or troubleshooting with basic technical support knowledge, preferred
Experience with diabetes, medical background, exposure to medical terms, preferred
Location On-site
This role is located at: 650 Executive Center Dr. Greenville, SC 29615.
This role will be hybrid, based on performance. When you move to the hybrid phase of employment, there are work-at-home requirements:
Transcom provides you with the equipment needed for this position. The computer contains a built-in webcam that is required to be used for training and meetings.
You must have a secure, quiet, distraction-free work environment without any conflicting responsibilities during your scheduled work shift, this includes caring for someone else in the home.
Your home office must be a private room with a door and cannot be a shared office space.
Your monitor cannot face a window, if the office is on a ground floor.
Your home office must have a DSL, Fiber, or Cable Internet that is hardwired into a modem/router via Ethernet.
Dial up, Wireless, Mobile Hotspot, or Satellite internet service cannot be used.
Your hardwired internet connection must meet the minimum speed requirements:
Minimum download speed 20 Mbps
Minimum upload speed 3 Mbps
Ping less than 100 ms or less
What Life at Transcom is like!
Transcom is a global customer experience specialist, providing customer care, sales, technical support and credit management services through our extensive network of contact centers and work-at-home agents. We are 30,000+ customer experience specialists at over 90 contact centers across 28 countries, delivering services in 33 languages to international brands in various industry verticals.
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
We are the voice of our clients. We are Transcom.
We are passionate about people and look forward to meeting you!

title: Customer Service Representative (M/F) Spanish and Portuguese Speaker
description_text:
General Information
Location
Porto
Job ID
9525
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
English, Portuguese, Spanish
Description & requirements
Description
We are seeking a dedicated and customer-oriented individual to join our team as a Customer Service Representative. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and enjoys helping customers resolve issues while providing exceptional service.
If you’re passionate about customer support, have a strong command of both Portuguese and English, and are eager to contribute to a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you!
What’s in it for you?
Fixed Salary is composed by Base Salary + Language Bonus + Project Bonus
Rotating schedules - that allow flexibility;
A collaborative and dynamic work environment where your skills and contributions are valued;
Full and Paid training - we ensure you feel confident in your role and can offer the best support to our customers;
A chance to work in an international environment with a team that encourages career progression.
Join us as a Portuguese and English speaking customer specialist!
As a customer Service Representative, you will play a key role in providing top-tier customer support, assisting them with inquiries and troubleshooting their issues. Your key responsibilities will include:
Assist customers via multiple channels in Portuguese, Spanish and English;
Troubleshoot and resolve customer inquiries, providing clear solutions and guidance;
Provide empathetic and efficient support, ensuring that customers feel heard and understood;
Handle customer complaints with patience, offering suitable solutions and escalations where necessary;
Collaborate with colleagues to ensure a consistent and seamless customer experience;
Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and service issues.
What are we looking for:
Native or fluent in Portuguese (C1+)
Advanced knowledge of English (C1+)
Availability to work 5 days per week (including Saturdays & Sundays)
Availability to work 8 hours per day, with shifts from 9am to 6pm;
Availability to work in shifts;
Availability to work in our office in Oporto;
Good computer skills;
Excellent communication skills;
Time management skills with the ability to meet goals and handle multiple customer interactions.
What is life like at Transcom?
Transcom is a global multinational customer experience specialist providing consulting, customer service, sales, technical support and collections services through our extensive network of contact centers and remote agents.
We are 30 000 customer experience specialists in over +85 contact centers in 29 countries, providing services in 33 languages to global brands in a variety of industries. Transcom is a company committed to equal opportunities between men and women.
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed to our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others.
Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.

Description & requirements
Description
Sei appassionato di e-commerce? Stai cercando un lavoro a tempo pieno, però flessibile, sfidante e con ottime possibilità di crescita professionale? Questa è la tua opportunità!
Cosa offriamo:
Stipendio motivante + bonus vantaggiosi
Opportunità di sviluppo e di carriera
Un ambiente di lavoro dinamico e socievole.
Attenzione alle necessità delle persone (work-life balance)
Una formazione professionale per capire come funziona il servizio di Customer Care.
Allora unisciti alla famiglia Transcom nel ruolo di Consulente Servizio Clienti
Svolgendo questo ruolo sarai parte attiva della nostra azienda fornendo un servizio clienti di qualità superiore e professionale, rispondendo ai clienti, utilizzando tutti i canali di comunicazione appropriati, identificando e valutando le esigenze dei clienti per raggiungere la loro soddisfazione. La soddisfazione dei nostri clienti è importante per noi ed è altrettanto importante il benessere e il comfort dei nostri dipendenti.
Cosa stiamo cercando:
Diploma di Scuola media superiore o equivalente
Livello di lingua italiana C1
Buona conoscenza dell'utilizzo PC (livello intermedio)
Ottime capacità relazionali, comunicative ed espositive
Propensione al lavoro in gruppo, alla risoluzione delle problematiche ed alla focalizzazione sui risultati
Buona predisposizione ai cambiamenti innovativi e all'apprendimento
Massima affidabilità puntualità, precisione ed organizzazione
Informazioni su Transcom
Transcom è una delle principali società globali di customer experience e fornisce servizi di assistenza clienti, vendita, supporto tecnico e gestione del credito attraverso la nostra vasta rete di contact center e operatori in work-at-home. Siamo 30.000 specialisti customer experience in 85+ contact center in 29 paesi, fornendo servizi in 33 lingue a marchi internazionali in vari settori verticali. In Transcom prendiamo sul serio gli impegni verso i clienti e verso noi stessi. Ogni giorno accogliamo nuovi talenti, coltiviamo il loro potenziale per far fronte alle skills del futuro. Siamo instancabili, amiamo il gioco di squadra e ci supportiamo l'un l'altro. Inguaribili ottimisti, promuoviamo il cambiamento nei team e nelle comunità in cui operiamo. In Transcom siamo così. Sei benvenuto, sin dal primo istante, così come sei. Non c'è limite a ciò che possiamo costruire insieme.

offriamo pari opportunità e tutti i candidati qualificati saranno presi in considerazione per l'assunzione senza distinzione di razza, colore, religione, sesso, origine nazionale, stato di disabilità, stato di veterano protetto o qualsiasi altra caratteristica tutelata dalla legge".

title: Danish Speaking Customer Service Representative
description_text:
General Information
Location
Work at Home
Job ID
9730
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Danish, English
Description & requirements
Description
Leder du efter en mulighed for at arbejde 100% hjemmefra? Så behøver du ikke lede længere. Vi er på udkig efter nysgerrige folk der er klar på nye udfordringer, en der vil være en del af noget særligt. Hvis du er passioneret omkring god service og brænder for at hjælpe vores kunder, så er Transcom det helt rette sted for dig!
Hvad er der i det for DIG!
God løn (ja, den er lige netop blevet endnu bedre!). Plus, få en tilmeldingsbonus på 500.000 Ft*.
Arbejdserfaring i et internationalt firma og et flersproget team.
Fremragende atmosfære, venligt og forskelligt miljø, teamwork.
Betalt træning og vejledning i at arbejde med et velrenommeret og stærkt brand.
Mulighed for at udvikle dig selv yderligere med fokus på kompetenceudvikling.
Konkurrencedygtig lønpakke.
Vi arbejder sammen i teams og mod et fælles mål, hvor alle hjælper hinanden.
Fleksibelt arbejdstider og vagtplaner.
Mulighed for at arbejde 100% hjemmefra i Ungarn.
Bliv en del af Transcom-familien som dansktalende kundeservicerådgiver!
Som vores nye kollega bliver du stemmen udadtil for et godt firma og et godt team. Du er ikke bare en kundeservicemedarbejder; du er en problemløser, en der gør en forskel.
Dine opgaver bliver:
At levere en fremragende og god kundeservice til vores kunder via telefon.
At håndtere og administrere kundesager effektivt med hjælp fra forskellige systemer.
At samarbejde med dit team om at nå fælles mål i et miljø, hvor vi altid hjælper hinanden.
Hvad vi leder efter:
Flydende sprogkundskaber i dansk og engelsk.
Fremragende skriftlige og mundtlige evner til at levere klar og empatisk kundeservice.
Skal udvise stærke kommunikations- og samarbejdsevner.
Kræver grundlæggende softwarekendskab.
Studentereksamen er påkrævet.
Det vil være en fordel at kunne vise:
Engagement og ansvarlighed over for kunden.
Innovation i alt, hvad du gør.
En stærk drivkraft til at fuldføre opgaver.
Personlig og professionel integritet.
Sådan er livet hos Transcom!
Hos Transcom er vi urokkeligt engagerede. I vores kunder og i hinanden. Hver dag starter nogen deres rejse hos Transcom. De tager det potentiale, de har i dag, og udvikler det til færdigheder for fremtiden. De bliver anerkendt for at arbejde hårdt, være teamspillere og støtte andre. De skaber positive og varige forandringer i deres teams og lokalsamfund. Sådan er vi hos Transcom. Her tager vi os af hinanden og hepper på hinanden. Du er inkluderet, præcis som du er, fra dag ét. Og med den rette indstilling er der ingen grænser for, hvor langt vi kan nå sammen.
*Udbetalingen sker i to rater: 250.000 Ft efter 3 måneder og yderligere 250.000 Ft efter 6 måneder.

Description & requirements
Description
Vi søger en
dansktalende kundeservicemedarbejder
med en problemløsende tankegang, der kan blive en del af et team af eksperter inden for kundeoplevelser. Ansøg nu og start noget fantastisk hos Transcom!
Elsker du at skabe relationer og løse problemer? Som
dansktalende kundeservicemedarbejder
får du mulighed for at hjælpe kunder, løse problemer og yde exceptionel service. Lyder det interessant? Slut dig til vores team og få en varig indflydelse.
Vigtigt:
Dette er ikke en ledig stilling; vi modtager dog gerne uopfordrede ansøgninger fra motiverede kandidater.
Ved at indsende din ansøgning accepterer du, at vi sikkert gemmer din profil og dit CV i vores database. Skulle der i fremtiden opstå en passende stilling, der matcher dine kompetencer og erfaring, kontakter vi dig direkte.
Hvad er der i det for dig!
Betalt oplæring/træning
Vores tidsplaner vil variere fra projekt til projekt, så foretrækker du en fast tidsplan eller en fleksibel - så vi har svaret
En ambitiøs og sikker arbejdsgiver med langsigtede mål
Virksomhedsfordele
Vækstmuligheder: Mere end 60 % af vores højere roller er besat af tidligere agenter. Når en ny mulighed opstår, deler vi den med vores ansatte først
Bliv en del af vores Transcom-familie som kundeservicerepræsentant!
Du kommer til at arbejde for vores kunder og levere førsteklasses service. For at passe til rollen som kundeservicemedarbejder søger vi en, der er løsningsorienteret, empatisk og ydmyg. Hos Transcom arbejder vi på at levere fremragende kundeservice alle ugens dage og altid give kunden dét ekstra.
Hvad leder vi efter:
Flydende i både dansk og engelsk, skriftligt og mundtligt
Stilling: CSR (Customer Service Representative)
Arbejdstid: Fuldtid (39 timer)
Ansættelsesform: Fastansættelse med 2 måneders prøvetid
Evne til at styre tid og nå mål
Løsningsorienteret og fleksibel, vi ønsker, at alle vores kunder skal føle sig godt taget hånd om, og at vi altid er i stand til at give dem den bedste løsning
Sådan er livet hos Transcom!
Vi hos Transcom er engageret over for vores kunder og for hinanden. Hver dag, er der nye personer som starter deres rejse med Transcom, de tager det potentiale som de har i dag, og og udvikler det til færdigheder i fremtiden. Sådan er vi hos Transcom; At blive anerkendt for hårdt arbejde, at være en teamplayer og støtte andre. Forkæmpere for positive forandringer i teams og samfund. Her holder vi af - og støtter op om hinanden. Du er inkluderet, ligesom du er, fra dag ét. Med den rette indstilling, er der ingen grænser for, hvor langt vi kan nå sammen.
Transcom er en global specialist i kundeservice og kundetilfredshed gennem vores omfattende netværk af 90+ kontaktcentre i 30 lande på 33 sprog. Vi er drevet af innovation og har en passion for at hjælpe mennesker.
For mere information om stillingen, bedes du kontakte os på hello.spain@transcom.com.

Betalt oplæring/træning Vores tidsplaner vil variere fra projekt til projekt, så foretrækker du en fast tidsplan eller en fleksibel - så vi har svaret En ambitiøs og sikker arbejdsgiver med langsigtede mål Virksomhedsfordele Vækstmuligheder: Mere end 60 % af vores højere roller er besat af tidligere agenter. Når en ny mulighed opstår, deler vi den med vores ansatte først Bliv en del af vores Transcom-familie som kundeservicerepræsentant! Du kommer til at arbejde for vores kunder og levere førsteklasses service. For at passe til rollen som kundeservicemedarbejder søger vi en, der er løsningsorienteret, empatisk og ydmyg. Hos Transcom arbejder vi på at levere fremragende kundeservice alle ugens dage og altid give kunden dét ekstra. Vi hos Transcom er engageret over for vores kunder og for hinanden. Hver dag, er der nye personer som starter deres rejse med Transcom, de tager det potentiale som de har i dag, og og udvikler det til færdigheder i fremtiden. Sådan er vi hos Transcom; At blive anerkendt for hårdt arbejde, at være en teamplayer og støtte andre. Forkæmpere for positive forandringer i teams og samfund. Her holder vi af - og støtter op om hinanden. Du er inkluderet, ligesom du er, fra dag ét. Med den rette indstilling, er der ingen grænser for, hvor langt vi kan nå sammen. Transcom er en global specialist i kundeservice og kundetilfredshed gennem vores omfattende netværk af 90+ kontaktcentre i 30 lande på 33 sprog. Vi er drevet af innovation og har en passion for at hjælpe mennesker. For mere information om stillingen, bedes du kontakte os på hello.spain@transcom.com.

title: Digital Solutions Director
description_text:
General Information
Location
Work at Home
Job ID
9890
Job Category
Business Development
Language Requirement
English, German
Description & requirements
Description
We’re CX fanatics, with technology at the core of everything we do. The most-loved brands rely on us to deliver seamless, tech-driven experiences. We’re looking for a passionate Digital Solutions Director to join our team and help us build cutting-edge solutions that make a real impact.
This role is open across EMEA and can be fully remote.
If you’re ready to start something brilliant, apply today!
Join Transcom as a Digital Solutions Director!
The Digital Solutions Director will position our organisation, with both new and existing clients, as a leader in the global CX BPO industry through forward-thinking strategies and scalable, efficient, and customer-centric digital initiatives. The successful person will lead the digital transformation of CX operations by leveraging cutting-edge technologies, optimising processes, and delivering innovative solutions that enhance customer satisfaction, drive client value, and ensure operational excellence. This role combines digital knowledge with consultancy/advisory project experience to optimise client operations.
What's in it for YOU!
International and inclusive environment
You feel supported, encouraged, and welcome from day one
Continuous development through our internal learning platforms and external training
Flexible work schedule
Life-work balance
Remote working
Corporate benefits and discounts
To be successful in this role, the following is needed:
Bachelor’s Degree:Computer Science, IT, Business Admin, Engineering, or Digital Marketing
Certified Customer Experience Professional (CCXP)
10–15 years of experience in technology-driven roles
Familiarity with:CRMs (Salesforce, Zendesk, Microsoft Dynamics) and their integration into CX workflows
Leveraging AI, RPA (Robotic Process Automation), chatbots, machine learning, and speech analytics for CX enhancements
System Integration: API integration, middleware, and digital ecosystems
Ability to define and execute a roadmap for digital transformation aligned with business goals
Skilled in collaborating with C-level executives, clients, and operational teams to align on digital initiatives
Experience in designing and implementing omnichannel solutions for seamless customer interactions
Understanding of key metrics like NPS, CSAT, FCR, and how digital tools impact them
English verbal and written: C1 English as a minimum for verbal and written communication
Additional language skills in German would be an advantage
Please include a full CV, in English, with your application.
Closing date is Friday 6th February 2026.
What Life at Transcom is like!
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.

title: Dutch-speaking Customer Service Representative - Porto

metadata.Description: Transcom is a global community of customer experience experts. All nimble, curious, driven, lifelong learners and all committed to the world's best-loved brands. We are looking for a Dutch-speaking Customer Service Representative who loves helping others and deeply cares about providing excellent customer service. And we want you to join us! Living abroad and considering relocating? This position based in Porto, Portugal is your chance! Porto offers a fantastic blend of history, culture, and a relaxed lifestyle, with all the amenities you'd want. Think stunning riverfronts, amazing food, and a thriving tech scene – all with big-city perks and significantly lower living costs. In fact, Porto is estimated to be around 40-50% cheaper than Amsterdam! It's the perfect spot to balance career growth with personal well-being. Even better? We offer comprehensive support to ease your relocation and make your move as smooth as possible. What’s in it for you? International and inclusive environment, that makes you feel supported, encouraged, and welcome from day one; Continuous development through our internal learning platforms and external training; Hybrid work model: The first 6 months require working from the office, followed by a transition to a hybrid model; Modern and comfortable office and relaxing spaces to take a break; Paid training that will introduce you to the specifics of the job; Endless growth opportunities: 50% of our seniors started their careers as customer service specialists. Any offer that can be filled internally will first be shared through our internal channels; Employee Referral Program: Receive an additional bonus for every successful referral; Additional benefits such as discounts at various retail store chains; Compensation package: base monthly salary of €1840 (including language bonus), €6.41 daily meal allowance, and annual vacation and Christmas bonuses of €920 each (all amounts before taxes). We understand that relocating for a new job can be a big step. To help with the transition, we offer a relocation package that includes: Reimbursement of transportation costs to Porto; Refund of 1 month's public transport fee (if applicable); Accommodation for the first 2 months; Relocation orientation to help you settle in and become familiar with your new city; Assistance with legal processes (if applicable). Join us as a Customer Service Specialist (Inbound & Backoffice)! In this position, you will be working with Vinted, the largest online international C2C marketplace in Europe dedicated to second-hand fashion. Your key responsibilities will include: Assist customers via multiple channels in English and Dutch; Troubleshoot and resolve customer inquiries, providing clear solutions and guidance; Provide empathetic and efficient support, ensuring that customers feel heard and understood; Collaborate with colleagues to ensure a consistent and seamless customer experience; Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and service issues. What are we looking for: Native or fluent in Dutch language (level C1+); Intermediate English proficiency (B2+) written and oral; Willingness to work in the office for the first 6 months, after which a hybrid model will be implemented; Ability to work shifts Monday-Friday between 7:00 AM and 11:00 PM; Strong verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills, such as empathy and listening; Positive attitude and willingness to provide brilliant customer experience – you believe that customers deserve more than just support. What is life like at Transcom? Transcom is a global customer experience specialist, offering consulting, customer service, sales, technical support, and collections via our vast network of contact centers and remote agents. We have 30,000+ customer experience specialists in 29 countries with 90+ locations, providing services in 33 languages to international brands in various industries. Transcom is an equal opportunity employer, committed to providing fair and inclusive opportunities for all, regardless of gender. At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.

Description
We are looking for a proactive and organized person to take full responsibility for the operational functionality and strategic development of our sites! If you are experienced at independently managing finances, contracts, and operations, this is your chance to further advance your career and impact the success of the entire company! Read on – you might just be the person we are looking for!

Site Operations Management:
Applying end-to-end responsibility for the facilities operational functionality of sites and overall responsibility for the strategic development and expansion of sites.
Ensuring Compliance:
Ensuring the provision of a safe working environment and ensuring compliance with statutory regulations on fire, health and safety standards.
Improvement and Reporting:
Reviewing existing operations regularly in order to reduce facilities costs and improve operational standards and procedures.
Purchasing Management:
Planning and executing purchasing needs of the sites, searching and selecting potential suppliers, negotiating, tracking fulfillment of vendor’s obligations defined by contracts. Making the budget application, and review of the purchases billing.
Contract Management:
Monitoring all service contracts related to site operations to ensure they are professionally delivered at the right costs.
Finance and Budget Management:
Actively working to ensure that the site's financial operations are meeting or exceeding targets and control requirements.

Controlling the planned activities, detecting variations and defining and implementing procedures aimed at increasing the levels of Site Lead team members' individual and team performance.

title: Gestor Comercial (M/F) Remoto

metadata.Description: Gosta de vendas e de comunicar com clientes de forma proativa? A Transcom está à procura de um Outbound Agent para apoiar um cliente líder global no setor da energia, reconhecido pela inovação e compromisso com a sustentabilidade. Nesta função, terá um papel ativo no contacto com clientes, identificando oportunidades e apresentando soluções que acrescentam valor real. Interessado/a? Estamos à sua espera! O que temos para si! - Ambiente internacional e inclusivo, onde se sentirá apoiado/a e bem-vindo/a desde o primeiro dia; - Formação inicial totalmente paga, com acompanhamento contínuo; - Oportunidades reais de crescimento — mais de 80% das posições séniores são ocupadas por antigos agentes; - Programa de recomendação de colaboradores com bónus adicional por cada indicação bem-sucedida; - Benefícios extra, como descontos em várias cadeias de lojas; - Trabalho remoto - Tem de viver a um raio de 50km do grande Porto devido a deslocações esporádicas ao escritório. Junte-se à Transcom como Outbound Agent! Estará na linha da frente da nossa operação comercial, representando soluções energéticas inovadoras. No seu dia a dia, irá: - Contactar clientes de forma proativa através de chamadas outbound; - Compreender necessidades e expectativas dos clientes; - Apresentar soluções comerciais ajustadas e orientadas para o valor; - Criar e desenvolver relações positivas e duradouras com os clientes; - Contribuir para os objetivos comerciais e para a satisfação do cliente. O que procuramos? - Boa capacidade de comunicação, argumentação e negociação; - Forte orientação para objetivos e resultados; - Capacidade de adaptação e aprendizagem rápida; - Bons conhecimentos informáticos na ótica do utilizador; - Boa gestão de tempo e organização; - Disponibilidade para trabalhar por turnos, no horário das 11h30 às 20h30; - Ligação à internet estável de, pelo menos, 10 Mbps ou superior. Como é a vida na Transcom! Na Transcom, estamos totalmente comprometidos, tanto com os clientes como uns com os outros. Todos os dias, alguém começa a sua jornada na Transcom. Pegamos no potencial já existente e transformamo-lo em competências para o futuro. Reconhecemos o esforço, o espírito de equipa e o apoio aos outros. Defendemos uma mudança positiva e duradoura nas nossas equipas e comunidades. É assim que somos na Transcom. Aqui, cuidamos uns dos outros!
