Work      independently with discipline and motivation to succeed in a virtual      environment where you work remotely with coworkers and supervisors from      the comfort of your home.
Work      in a highly structured environment with strict adherence to your assigned      full-time schedule taking high-volume inbound calls from customers.
Work      at a desk and wear an approved headset for the duration of a full-time      schedule in order to talk to customers in a high-volume, fast-paced, and      sometimes stressful environment
Requirements
The following items are mandatory pre-employment requirements and/or skills that are required to be successful in this role. The skills listed are skills that must be used daily and for a prolonged period of time, up to the full duration of your scheduled shift.
At      least 18 years or older
High      School Diploma, or equivalent
Able      to successfully pass a criminal background check
Able      to work a full-time work week of 32-40 hours, with overtime opportunities      as needed
Able      to maintain 100% strict adherence to the assigned schedule
Able      to work a variety of shifts influenced by current business needs      (including evenings, weekends, and holidays)
Able      to work full-time hours, with reliable attendance, as outlined in the      assigned schedule
Strong      computer knowledge, including ability to accurately type at least 30 wpm
Excellent      English written and verbal communication skills
Courteous      and friendly with high level of professionalism
Willingness      to follow procedures and adhere to policies
Able      to communicate information and ideas so others will understand and able to      exchange accurate information in these situations
Able      to multitask applications while talking to customers on the phone
Able      to thrive in a fast-paced, time-pressured, dynamic work environment taking      back-to-back calls
Able      to actively listen to customer needs and demonstrate empathy - this      includes having problem sensitivity - solve customer problems and be      sensitive to others while you do it
Highly      adept at working with a high frequency of conflict situations, as well as      upset customers
Ability      to work in an environment where you must sit, reach, communicate (verbally      and electronically), type, read, multi-task, and concentrate in a      prolonged setting.
Able      to use your hands to handle, control, or feel objects, tools, or controls
Experience      with insurance claims or prescription background, preferred
Previous      call center and/or work from home experience, required
Location Requirements
Must live and work in one of the following states:
AL, AR, FL, GA, ID, IN, IA, KS, KY, LA, MO, MS, NE, NH, NC, ND, OH, OK, *SC, SD, TN, TX, UT, VA, WI, WV
*We have a site in Greenville, South Carolina. We cannot accept remote applicants within 30 miles of the Greenville site.
Work at Home Requirements:
Transcom      provides you an all-in-one computer, monitor, and headset for this      position. The computer contains a built-in webcam that is required to be      used for training and meetings.
You      must have a secure, quiet, distraction-free work environment without any      conflicting responsibilities during your scheduled work shift, including      caring for a family member.
Your      home office must be a private room with a door and cannot be a shared      office space.
Your      monitor cannot face a window, if the office is on the ground floor.
Your      home office must have a DSL, Fiber, or Cable Internet that is hardwired      into a modem/router via Ethernet.
(Dial      up, Wireless, Mobile Hotspot, or Satellite internet service cannot be      used)
Your      hardwired internet connection must meet the minimum speed      requirements:
Minimum      download speed 20 Mbps
Minimum      upload speed 3 Mbps
Ping      less than 100 ms or less
Although the computer is provided if you are hired, you will need a home desktop or laptop computer that is hardwired using an Ethernet connection to complete the typing and internet speed assessments during the application. This is a requirement to be considered for this employment opportunity.
What Life at Transcom is like!
Transcom is a global customer experience specialist, providing customer care, sales, technical support and credit management services through our extensive network of contact centers and work-at-home agents. We are 30,000+ customer experience specialists at over 90 contact centers across 28 countries, delivering services in 33 languages to international brands in various industry verticals.
Right now, we are growing our virtual footprint in North America and currently hire remote employees in 26 states and 3 Canadian provinces. Proud to be recognized by FlexJobs as #4 on their list of the Top 100 companies to watch for remote work in 2026.
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
We are the voice of our clients. We are Transcom.
We are passionate about people and look forward to meeting you!

title: IT Service Delivery Engineer - Manila, Philippines
description_text:
General Information
Location
Pasig- Tiendesitas
Job ID
717
Job Category
Information Technology (IT)
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is looking for talented individuals like you to join our awesome team! Be the next
IT Service Delivery Engineer
for our Transcom
Pasig
site.
What's in it for YOU
Driven by our "Malasakit" culture, we make certain that our team members are well-cared for. Hence we are proving these employee benefits, which you'll be able to utilize once you join our team!
Day 1 HMO
Meal & Transportation Allowance
Rice Subsidy
Clothing Allowance
24/7 Teleconsult
Free Psychologist Consultation
In-house & Online Pharmacy
Scholarship Program
Retirement Fund
Free Meal & Medicine (through Transcom’s Tap Card Rewards)
Loyalty Incentives
Accidental & Life Insurance
Free Shuttle Service
Join our Transcom Family as an IT Service Delivery Engineer
The IT Service Delivery Engineer has a multifunctional role acting as a workstation administrator, local infrastructure administrator, and primary IT contact for a specific site. He will be in charge of physical support and maintenance of any IT equipment of a specific site he is assigned to. The IT Service Delivery Engineer shall provide first or second-tier user local support and serve as a primary contact for Service Desk personnel to rely on to resolve service interruptions or assist end users who seek advice on information technology issues, products, and services. The position of the IT Service Delivery Engineer will be expected to resolve most information technology related end user workstation issues as well as assist in the deployment of new systems and processes.
Strategy & Planning
Recommend Workstation (Desktop/Laptop/Thin Client) Hardware & Software Specifications and Configurations.
Prepare policies and procedures involving Desktop Administration and Support
Acquisition & Deployment
The Desktop Administrator shall manage or coordinate orders, preparation, and deployment of computers (desktop, laptops, thin clients, etc.)
Operational Management
Responsible for all computer equipment installations and service. Maintain all hardware/software inventories for personal computers. Coordinate maintenance and repair of all computer peripherals.
Works with the end users to customize the computer; trains customer on system changes.
Ultimately responsible for the care and maintenance of the IT Storage room.
Returns or disposes of leased or obsolete equipment.
As an IT Service Delivery Engineer:
Provide support to end users at the desk side, for a particular location assigned to him
Provide instruction and training to individual end users to resolve problems and reduce reoccurrence.
Responsible for maintaining and support for printers, Fax Machines or Bat Phones
Perform on-site analysis, diagnosis, and resolution of complex desktop problems for end users, and recommend and implement corrective solutions, including off-site repair for remote users as needed.
Install, configure, test, maintain, monitor, and troubleshoot end-user workstations and related hardware and software in order to deliver required desktop service levels.
Ensures anti-virus software and appropriate security patches are installed timely.
Assess the need for and implement performance upgrades to PC boxes
Collaborate with LAN engineer/network administrators to ensure efficient operation of the company's computing environment.
Receive and respond to incoming calls, pages, and/or e-mails regarding desktop problems.
Answer to and perform moves, adds, and changes (MAC) requests related to Desktop Administration
Ensure that physical desktop connections are in proper working order.
Prepare tests and applications for monitoring desktop performance, then provide performance statistics and reports.
Assist in preparing, maintaining, and upholding procedures for logging, reporting, and statistically monitoring desktop operations.
Develop and maintain an inventory of all computer related components and equipment.
Accurately document instances of desktop equipment or component failure, repair, installation, and removal.
If necessary, liaise with third-party support and PC equipment vendors.
Conduct research on desktop products in support of PC procurement and development efforts. Evaluate and recommend products for purchase.
Assist in developing long-term strategies and capacity planning for meeting future desktop hardware needs.
Write technical specifications for purchase of PCs, desktop hardware and related products.
Assists in planning computer deployment for new areas.
Responsible for the creation of a standard PC/Thin Client image for all existing and incoming hardware
Responsible for creation of documentation on the creation of the standard image for future state as well as knowledge transfer and disaster recovery
Creation of software packages for new systems, software upgrades, patches or as needed.
Responsible for testing all packages for impact of deployment and resolve potential issues
Identify areas of improvement and create action plan and implement solutions with the assistance of the team
Mentors and instructs junior members of the team for technical development
Completes change control forms/plans for deployment projects/updates
Completes QA test plans/UAT for new deployments and software packages and coordinates and/or assists in the completion of testing.
What Life at Transcom is like
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed to our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
We are highly driven by our "Malasakit" culture. Transcom, in its very core, is all about an inclusive team that is focused on people. It all comes down to setting the bar for dignity, equality, and respect. It means that each one takes part in proactively shaping, cultivating, and building the company we want to work and live in. This is why genuine concern is so vital to us.
Transcom is looking for talented individuals like you to join our awesome team! Be the next
IT Service Delivery Engineer
for our Transcom
Pasig
site.

title: Konsultant u oblasti bele tehnike (španski jezik)
description_text:
General Information
Location
Belgrade
Job ID
9886
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Spanish
Description & requirements
Description
Zainteresovan/a si za najnovije trendove u beloj tehnici i voliš da istražuješ kako savremeni aparati mogu poboljšati svakodnevni život? Ako te komuniakcija sa ljudima ono što te ispunjava, a ujedno želiš da im preneseš veštine i rešenja koja ćemo te naučiti, možda si idealan kandidat za naš tim!
Šta te očekuje od samog početka?
Privatno zdravstveno osiguranje za sve članove tima
Mogućnost rada od kuće
Ugovor na neodređeno vreme
već od prvog dana obuke
Mogućnost ostvarivanja mesečnih bonusa
Mogućnost ostvarivanja dodatnih mesecnih bonusa kroz aktivnosti prodaje garancija (naš tim svakako radi samo sa dolaznim pozivima)
Pristup pogodnostima u rekreativnim objektima
Svestran razvoj kroz kontinuirano usavršavanje i napredovanje u oblasti koja te zanima
Učestvovanje u raznovrsnim kompanijskim događanjima, obukama i treninzima koji doprinose tvom ličnom i profesionalnom rastu
Pridruži nam se kao Konsultant za tehničku podršku (španski jezik)!
Tvoje ključne obaveze bi uključivale:
Komuniciranje putem mejla i poziva sa klijentima na španskom jeziku i odgovaranje na njihove upite
Rešavanje manjih kvarova uređaja i pružanje pomoći u vezi sa pitanjima korisnika vezanih za funkcionisanje i pravilno korišćenje uredjaja
Informisanje korisnika o aktuelnom statusu njihove garancije
Organizovanje intervencije za složenije popravke uređaja
Pomoć u procesu reklamacije
Prepoznavanje prilika za prodaju produženih garancija
Praćenje novih tehnoloških trendova i promena na tržištu
Kako da prepoznaš da si idealan kandidat za naš tim?
Imaš odlično znanje španskog jezika (C1/C2 nivo)
Komunikacija ti ide od ruke, a pomaganje drugima te ispunjava
Uživaš u timskom radu i dinamičnom okruženju
Pokreće te motivacija i odgovornost
Imaš želju za napredovanjem u ovoj industriji
Kako izgleda život u Transcomu?
U Transcomu smo neumorno posvećeni. Našim klijentima i jedni drugima. Svakog dana neko započne svoje putovanje sa Transcomom. Uzimajući potencijal koji imaju danas i pretvarajući ga u veštine za budućnost. Dobijanje priznanja za naporan rad, timskog igrača i podršku drugima. Zagovaranje pozitivnih, trajnih promena u svojim timovima i zajednicama. Takvi smo mi u Transcomu. Ovde nam je stalo, i navijamo jedni za druge. Uključeni ste, baš takvi kakvi jeste, od prvog dana. A sa pravim načinom razmišljanja, nema granice koliko daleko možemo ići zajedno.

već od prvog dana obuke

description_text:
General Information
Location
Grudziadz
Job ID
9924
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Polish
Description & requirements
Description
Dołącz do naszego zespołu w Grudziądzu obsługującego znanego dostawcę usług cyfrowych. Rozwiń kompetencje przyszłości w obszarze obsługi klienta opartej o nowoczesne rozwiązania (CX) razem z 1200 konsultantami i konsultantkami w całej Polsce!
U nas otrzymasz:
Wynagrodzenie w wysokości 31,40 zł brutto / h (umowa zlecenie) + premię bez górnego limitu.
Szkolenie wdrażające i wsparcie w codziennej pracy.
W pierwszych 3 miesiącach rozwiniesz umiejętność badania potrzeb klienta, sprzedaży i prowadzenia rozmów w założonych ramach.
Jasną ścieżkę rozwoju i realne możliwości awansu - ponad 50% rekrutacji na wyższe stanowiska wygrywają nasi wewnętrzni pracownicy.
Program poleceń pracowniczych - do 3000 zł brutto za zatrudnienie pracownika z Twojego polecenia.
Konkursy z nagrodami pieniężnymi, wartościowe gadżety i wiele więcej!
Jak wygląda dzień pracy?
Kontaktujemy się z obecnymi klientami w celu aktualizacji warunków promocyjnych, odbieramy także połączenia od użytkowników zainteresowanych naszymi usługami. Naszym zadaniem jest skuteczne pozyskanie i/lub utrzymanie klienta.
Wyróżniają Cię:
Dobra umiejętność obsługi komputera - wszystkie zadania wykonujemy elektronicznie.
Nastawienie na sprzedaż, aktywne słuchanie i wielozadaniowość.
Gotowość do pracy w systemie zmianowym - od poniedziałku do piątku (zmiany w godz. 9:00 - 21:00).
Z doświadczenia wiemy, że kandydaci, którzy mają kompetencje, mają także tendencję do zaniżania oceny swoich umiejętności. Dlatego daj sobie szansę i aplikuj!
O nas
W Transcom jesteśmy nieustannie zaangażowani w relacje między sobą i naszymi klientami. Każdego dnia ktoś nowy zaczyna z nami przygodę i wykorzystuje swój potencjał, przekształcając go w umiejętności przyszłości. Doceniamy ciężką pracę, grę zespołową i wzajemną pomoc, wspieramy pozytywne i trwałe zmiany. Tacy właśnie jesteśmy, dbamy o siebie i od samego początku sobie kibicujemy, a przy odpowiednim nastawieniu nie ma przed nami ograniczeń i możemy zajść naprawdę daleko.

title: Kundtjänstmedarbetare – Premiumbilmärke
description_text:
General Information
Location
Stockholm
Job ID
9893
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Swedish
Description & requirements
Description
Har du ett intresse för bilar? Brinner du även för att skapa goda kundrelationer, ge professionell service och samtidigt arbeta med mycket eget ansvar? Då kan du vara vår nya kollega!
Hos oss levererar vi kundservice i världsklass på fyra olika språk - danska, finska, norska och svenska. Du kommer att vara en del av vårt svenska team. Hos oss finner du en inkluderande arbetsplats med trevliga kollegor och möjligheter för dig att växa både professionellt och personligt.
Vad erbjuder vi dig
Hos oss får du möjlighet att utvecklas och växa som individ. Här kan du bygga en karriär, bland annat inom produktkunskap och ledarskap. Din anställning startar med ett introduktionsprogram där du får lära dig verktygen du behöver i rollen. Vi har fyra år i rad blivit utsedda till ett av Sveriges Karriärföretag, 90% av våra ledare har börjat sin resa på förstalinje och varje år utbildar vi i snitt 30 nya ledare.
Vi sitter i en fin och härlig lokal i Kista med tillgång till gym. Utöver detta erbjuder vi även:
Kollektivavtal
Tjänstepension
Friskvårdsbidrag
Rikskortet
Utvecklingsmöjligheter
Betald introduktionsutbildning
Din roll inom kundsupport
I din roll kommer du att hantera inkommande samtal, e-postmeddelanden och chatt-förfrågningar från kunder med fokus på det ekonomiska. Det kan handla om allt från räkningar & kontrakt, till finansiering av en produkt under längre tid. Utöver detta ger du professionell service på en hög nivå för ett välkänt varumärke och hanterar kunders olika ärenden för att tillgodose deras behov. Du strävar efter att ge våra kunder en förstklassig kundupplevelse. Du får mycket eget ansvar, men lämnas aldrig utan stöd tack vare tydliga rutiner, en stark teamkänsla och ett högt engagemang bland både kollegor och ledare – på Transcom jobbar vi tillsammans!
Befattning: CSR (Customer Service Representative) Transcom
Arbetstider: Måndag-fredag kl. 07:50-16.35 på kontoret i Kista
Anställningsgrad: 100%
Fast månadslön med möjlighet till bonus baserad på kundnöjdhet och effektivitet på både team- och individnivå.
Kollektivavtal: Call/Contact Center och Marknadsundersökningsföretag
Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med en provanställning på 6 månader
Startdatum
: 9 Februari, 2026
Om dig
Du är en person som älskar att sätta sig in i nya saker och se dig omkring. Vi ser gärna att du besitter en nyfikenhet, är tydlig i din kommunikation och har lätt för att anpassa dig efter kundens olika behov. Vidare tror vi att du är en person som har ett gott tålamod och även besitter det där lilla extra när det kommer till service.
Framför allt vill du arbeta inom ett företag som erbjuder personlig utveckling, vidareutbildning och möjligheten att växa för den som visar framfötterna. Allt detta i ett företag som har väldigt kul på jobbet!
Utöver detta ser vi att du har följande kompetenser:
Svenska flytande i tal och skrift
Engelska flytande i tal och skrift.
Inneha en gymnasieexamen.
Hos oss behöver du inte ha någon tidigare erfarenhet - vi lägger större vikt vid dig som person.
Rekryteringsprocessen
Intervjuer genomförs löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum - så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
Om du har frågor kring tjänsten går det bra att maila oss på jobb.sverige@transcom.com
Om Transcom
Transcom är en global specialist inom kundservice och kundnöjdhet genom vårt omfattande nätverk av 90 kontaktcenter i 29 länder på 33 språk. Vi drivs av innovation och har en passion för att hjälpa människor att lösa problem. Dessutom är vi en av Sveriges största arbetsgivare för unga människor. På Transcom är vi engagerade. Till våra kunder och varandra. Varje dag börjar någon sin resa med Transcom. Att ta den potential som finns idag och omvandla den till kompetens för framtiden. Att bli noterad för att arbeta hårt, vara en lagspelare och stötta andra. Bidrar med positiva och varaktiga förändringar i sitt team och till samhället. Det är precis så vi är på Transcom. Här bryr vi oss om varandra. Du är inkluderad, precis som du är, från dag ett.
Vi är en arbetsgivare som tillämpar lika möjligheter och alla kvalificerade sökande kommer att beaktas för anställning utan hänsyn till ras, hudfärg, religion, kön, nationellt ursprung, funktionsnedsättning, skyddad veteranstatus eller någon annan egenskap som skyddas av lag.

title: Kundtjänstmedarbetare för Tele2 Företagskunder
description_text:
General Information
Location
Eskilstuna
Job ID
9898
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
English, Swedish
Description & requirements
Description
Är du en person som andas service och vill ta ägandeskap för våra kunders inkommande ärenden? Vi erbjuder en spännande möjlighet att utvecklas inom kommunikation, försäljning och kundbemötande. Vill du bli en del av oss och vårat fantastiska team i
Eskilstuna
? Då är du vår nya kollega!
Vad erbjuder vi dig
Hos oss på Transcom får du chansen att förfina dina professionella kompetenser och växa som individ tillsammans med företaget. Vi erbjuder karriärsutveckling som innebär att du kan arbeta i rollen inom sälj, produktkunskap, ledarskap eller coachning. Inledningsvis av anställningen erbjuder vi dig ett betalt introduktionsprogram för att ge dig rätt förutsättningar och verktyg. Vi har sju år i rad blivit utsedda till ett av Sveriges Karriärföretag, 90% av våra ledare har börjat sin resa på telefon och varje år utbildar vi nästan 30 stycken nya ledare.
Utöver detta får du:
⦁
Kollektivavtal och tjänstepension.
⦁
Friskvårdsbidrag.
⦁
Rikskortet, för att spara pengar när du handlar mat i butik/resturang.
⦁
Karriärmöjligheter i ett globalt stort företag.
⦁
Fast grundlön med goda bonusmöjligheter.
⦁
Möjlighet att leasa förmånlig cykel via vår Bikelease-lösning.
⦁
Bidrag till terminalglasögon - vi värnar om din syn.
Din roll inom kundsupport
I din roll kommer du att hantera inkommande samtal från
Tele2's företagskunder
. Vi lägger stor vikt på att leverera professionell service och att tillgodose kundens behov. För att kunna ge våra kunder en förstklassig upplevelse arbetar vi med behovsanalys, som hjälper oss att anpassa rätt tjänst till rätt kund. Du kommer att få lära dig mer om kundbemötande, att anpassa dig efter kunden och att arbeta med personlig försäljning i form av merförsäljning!
Du får mycket eget ansvar, men lämnas aldrig utan stöd tack vare tydliga rutiner, en stark teamkänsla och ett högt engagemang bland både kollegor och ledare - på Transcom jobbar vi tillsammans!
Befattning: CSR (Customer Service Representative) Transcom
Arbetstid: Schemalagd arbetstid, med öppettider vardagar 07:45-18:15. Lördagar och söndagar stängt.
⦁
Betald utbildning: 100%
⦁
Anställningsgrad: 80%
⦁
Kollektivavtal: Call/Contact Center och Marknadsundersökningsföretag
⦁
Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning, provanställning 6 månader
⦁
Startdatum: 9 Mars 2026
Om dig
Framför allt vill du arbeta inom ett företag som erbjuder personlig utveckling, vidareutbildning och möjligheten att växa för den som visar framfötterna. Allt detta i ett företag som har väldigt kul på jobbet!
Vi lägger störst vikt vid dig och din personlighet, men för att lyckas i rollen ser vi även följande kompetenser hos dig:
⦁
Svenska flytande i tal och skrift då de flesta av våra kunder är svensktalande
⦁
Engelska flytande i tal och skrift för att kommunicera med kunder utanför det svenska språket
⦁
Öppensinnad och villig att lära sig
⦁

title: Lead Backend Developer
description_text:
General Information
Location
Zagreb
Job ID
9843
Job Category
Information Technology (IT)
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is a global community of customer experience experts  with technology at the core of everything we do.  Right now, we’re searching for a Lead Backend Developer. This role involves leading a small, highly skilled team as well as contributing to the overall building and maintenance of our backend systems.
Ready to take the lead and make a difference? Join us and let’s create something brilliant together!
Join Transcom as a Lead Backend Developer!
In this role you will lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust, scalable, and efficient backend systems that support the company’s products and services. This role involves ensuring technical excellence through best practices and rigorous testing, while fostering a collaborative environment where team members can grow and succeed.
In this role, you will:
Be responsible team growth and development
Align technical solutions with business goals
Contribute to the technical roadmap and implementing continuous improvements
Build and maintain backend systems that meet current needs
and are prepared to evolve with future demands
Be responsible for optimizing system performance
Oversee the implementation of system architecture, including databases, APIs, and microservices
Ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards
Build and lead a team of engineers across their employment journey
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including frontend engineers, product managers, and designers
Ensure backend systems adhere to security best practices and compliance requirements
What's in it for YOU!
International and inclusive environment
Support, and encouragement from day one
Continuous development through our internal learning platforms and external training
Modern and comfortable office and relaxing spaces to take a break
Flexible work schedule
Life-work balance
Hybrid working model
Corporate benefits and discounts
To be successful in this role, the following is needed:
Bachelor’s degree (B.A. or B.S.) or relevant IT and work experience
7+ year of software engineering experience
Strong experience in JavaScript, our core stack is
node.js
REST API development experience is a must
Demonstrated development & deployment experience in Cloud environments, GCP is an advantage; AWS or Azure
Good experience with different database technologies
Experience following an Agile development framework
Detailed-oriented but able to see the big picture
Excellent communication skills and a team player attitude
A desire to lead, mentor and support the team
Fluency (C1) in English is a must (both written and spoken)
Closing date for applications is Monday 8th February 2026
Please include a CV in English with your application
What Life at Transcom is like!
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.

Kantoor/Thuiswerk: eerste 3 maanden op kantoor, daarna twee dagen verplicht op kantoor, thuiswerken mogelijk na goedkeuring van de team leaders
Werkplek: Inspirerende-, sociale werkomgeving in het bruisende Groningen

Teamgevoel: Samenwerking met leuke collega’s

Als klantenservicemedewerker voor Odido Service & Tech beantwoord je vragen over mobiele telefonie, internet en tv, zoals:
Mobiele diensten: Hoe installeer ik mijn simkaart? Hoe krijg ik internet op mijn mobiel?
Thuisdiensten: Mijn internet is traag, wat nu? Hoe stel ik mijn tv-box in?
Je helpt klanten met hun vragen, maar sales is ook een erg belangrijk deel van je rol. Dankzij je commerciële inzicht weet je precies wanneer cross- of upselling waarde toevoegt — voor de klant én het resultaat.

Taalvaardigheden: Nederlands C2 en Engels (C1)
Openingstijden: maandag - vrijdag 08:00-20:00, zaterdag en zondag 09:00-17:30
Beschikbaarheid: 5 dagen/week beschikbaar, maandagochtend verplicht, 3 avonden/week tot 20:00 (vrijdagavond verplicht), 2 weekenden/maand (zat/zon)
Flexibel om meer/minder uren te werken (afhankelijk van werklast)Servicegericht: Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden en klantvriendelijk
Technische affiniteit: Sterke interesse in technologie en sterke basis computervaardigheden

Probleemoplossend vermogen: Klanten proactief en efficiënt helpen

Bij Transcom zijn we toegewijd aan klanten én elkaar. Elke dag begint iemand zijn/haar reis bij Transcom. Ze ontwikkelen potentieel tot waardevolle vaardigheden. Ze worden erkend voor inzet, teamgeest en steun aan anderen. Ze zetten zich in voor positieve verandering binnen teams.

title: Nie znalazłeś oferty dla Ciebie? Zostaw nam swoje CV
description_text:
General Information
Location
Gdansk
Job ID
3057
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Polish
Description & requirements
Description
Przejrzałeś/łaś nasze aktualne ogłoszenia i nie znalazłeś/łaś nic dla siebie? Nie wszystko stracone! Prześlij nam swoje CV i zostaw kontakt do siebie, a my skontaktujemy się z Tobą, gdy tylko pojawi się możliwość nawiązania współpracy w ramach roli odpowiadającej Twoim kwalifikacjom.
Czekają na Ciebie:
Wynagrodzenie zasadnicze i dodatkowe premie (na poszczególnych projektach obowiązują różne stawki, szczegóły poznasz w podczas rozmowy telefonicznej z Talent Acquisition Specialist).
Szkolenie wdrażające i wsparcie w codziennej pracy.
Jasna ścieżkę rozwoju i realne możliwości awansu - ponad 90% rekrutacji na wyższe stanowiska wygrywają nasi wewnętrzni pracownicy.
Program poleceń pracowniczych - do 3000 zł brutto za zatrudnienie pracownika z Twojego polecenia.
Konsultacje z psychologiem, karta sportowa (Medicover Sport), opieka medyczna (Medicover), dofinansowanie wypoczynku, kafeteria Worksmile, zniżki na produkty naszych partnerów i wiele więcej!
Jak wygląda dzień pracy?
Dołączając do Transcom, masz możliwość wyboru pracy w jednym z działów:
W działach obsługowych zapoznajemy się z bieżącą sytuacją i zmianami w procedurach. Udzielamy odpowiedzi na pytania klientów spływające do nas drogą telefoniczną, mailową, za pośrednictwem videorozmów lub chatów. Wiemy, że w przypadku nieco trudniejszych zgłoszeń możemy liczyć na wsparcie zespołu i innych działów.
W działach sprzedażowych kontaktujemy się z obecnymi klientami w celu aktualizacji warunków promocyjnych, odbieramy także połączenia od użytkowników zainteresowanych naszymi usługami. Naszym zadaniem jest skuteczne pozyskanie i/lub utrzymanie klienta.
W działach administracyjnych wspieramy firmę w codziennym funkcjonowaniu w zakresie administracji, IT, HR i wielu innych obszarów.
Wyróżniają Cię:
Dobra umiejętność obsługi komputera - wszystkie zadania wykonujemy elektronicznie.
Umiejętność słuchania i tworzenia jasnych wypowiedzi z szacunkiem do drugiej osoby.
Znajomość jednego z języków: polski, niemiecki, francuski, angielski, fiński, szwedzki, norweski, duński, włoski, czeski, słowacki, ukraiński, litewski, hebrajski.
O nas
W Transcom jesteśmy nieustannie zaangażowani w relacje między sobą i naszymi klientami. Każdego dnia ktoś nowy zaczyna z nami przygodę i wykorzystuje swój potencjał, przekształcając go w umiejętności przyszłości. Doceniamy ciężką pracę, grę zespołową i wzajemną pomoc, wspieramy pozytywne i trwałe zmiany. Tacy właśnie jesteśmy, dbamy o siebie i od samego początku sobie kibicujemy, a przy odpowiednim nastawieniu nie ma przed nami ograniczeń i możemy zajść naprawdę daleko.

Description

Timeplanene våre vil variere fra prosjekt til prosjekt, så foretrekker du en fast tidsplan eller en fleksibel - så har vi svaret.

Description

Work experience in an international company and multilingual team.
Excellent atmosphere, friendly and diverse environment, teamwork.
Paid training and guidance in working with a reputable and strong brand.
Opportunity to further develop yourself with a focus on skills development.
Competitive remuneration package.
We work together in teams and together towards a common goal where everyone helps each other.

title: Pracownik/czka w biurze obsługi klienta
description_text:
General Information
Location
Gdansk
Job ID
2347
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Polish
Description & requirements
Description
Dołącz do zespołu obsługującego użytkowników znanej sieci komórkowej. Rozwiń kompetencje przyszłości w obszarze obsługi klienta opartej o nowoczesne rozwiązania (CX) razem z 1200 konsultantami i konsultantkami w całej Polsce!
U nas otrzymasz:
Wynagrodzenie w wysokości 31,40 zł brutto / h (umowa zlecenie) + (bez górnego limitu w działach sprzedażowych, do 500 zł brutto w dziale obsługowym).
Szkolenie wdrażające (min. 6 dni roboczych, stacjonarnie) i wsparcie w codziennej pracy.
W zależności od działu, w pierwszych 3 miesiącach rozwiniesz umiejętność komunikacji, badania potrzeb klienta, sprzedaży i prowadzenia rozmów w założonych ramach.
Jasną ścieżkę rozwoju i realne możliwości awansu - ponad 90% rekrutacji na wyższe stanowiska wygrywają nasi wewnętrzni pracownicy.
Program poleceń pracowniczych - do 3000 zł brutto za zatrudnienie pracownika z Twojego polecenia.
Konkursy z nagrodami pieniężnymi, wartościowe gadżety i wiele więcej!
Jak wygląda dzień pracy?
Dołączając do Transcom, masz możliwość wyboru pracy w jednym z działów:
W dziale obsługowym zapoznajemy się z bieżącą sytuacją i zmianami w procedurach, odbieramy połączenia i obsługujemy klientów. Najpopularniejsze pytania dotyczą wystawionych faktur, problemów z zasięgiem, szczegółów oferty. Wiemy, że w przypadku nieco trudniejszych zgłoszeń możemy liczyć na wsparcie zespołu i innych działów.
W dziale sprzedażowym kontaktujemy się z obecnymi klientami w celu aktualizacji warunków promocyjnych, odbieramy także połączenia od użytkowników zainteresowanych naszymi usługami. Naszym zadaniem jest skuteczne pozyskanie i/lub utrzymanie klienta.
Wyróżniają Cię:
Dobra umiejętność obsługi komputera - wszystkie zadania wykonujemy elektronicznie.
Umiejętność słuchania i tworzenia jasnych wypowiedzi z szacunkiem do drugiej osoby.
Nastawienie na sprzedaż, aktywne słuchanie i wielozadaniowość - jeśli interesuje Cię praca w dziale sprzedażowym.
Z doświadczenia wiemy, że kandydaci, którzy mają kompetencje, mają także tendencję do zaniżania oceny swoich umiejętności. Dlatego daj sobie szansę i aplikuj!
O nas
W Transcom jesteśmy nieustannie zaangażowani w relacje między sobą i naszymi klientami. Każdego dnia ktoś nowy zaczyna z nami przygodę i wykorzystuje swój potencjał, przekształcając go w umiejętności przyszłości. Doceniamy ciężką pracę, grę zespołową i wzajemną pomoc, wspieramy pozytywne i trwałe zmiany. Tacy właśnie jesteśmy, dbamy o siebie i od samego początku sobie kibicujemy, a przy odpowiednim nastawieniu nie ma przed nami ograniczeń i możemy zajść naprawdę daleko.

metadata.Description: At Transcom, we specialize in providing exceptional customer experience services to the world’s most well-known and respected brands. We are looking for a dedicated and detail-oriented Quality Analyst to join our team and ensure the highest standards in service quality. If you have previous experience in the pharmaceutical market and are focused about delivering quality results, this could be the perfect opportunity for you! Join us as a Quality Analyst in the Pharmaceutical Market! As a Quality Analyst at Transcom, particularly within the pharmaceutical market, you’ll be at the forefront of ensuring that our service quality consistently meets the highest standards. Your role will directly impact the experience of customers interacting with top pharmaceutical brands. You will be responsible for: Evaluate customer service calls, emails and chat interactions to ensure they comply with quality standards, including regulatory requirements specific to the pharmaceutical industry; Deliver constructive feedback to agents and teams, helping them improve performance and align with quality expectations. Any offer that can be filled internally will first be shared through our internal channels; Employee Referral Program: Receive an additional bonus for every successful referral; Additional benefits such as discounts at various retail store chains. What Life at Transcom is like! Transcom is a global customer experience specialist, offering consulting, customer service, sales, technical support, and collections via our vast network of contact centers and remote agents. We have 30,000+ customer experience specialists in 29 countries with 90+ locations, providing services in 33 languages to international brands in various industries. Description
In Transcom, offriamo servizi di customer experience di alta qualità dei brand più noti e apprezzati a livello internazionale. Siamo alla ricerca di un Quality Analyst, attento ai dettagli e con un forte impegno verso l'eccellenza, che si unisca al nostro team per assicurare il raggiungimento dei più alti standard di servizio.
Se hai esperienza nel settore farmaceutico e sei determinato a garantire risultati di elevata qualità, questa potrebbe essere l'opportunità che fa per te.
Entra a far parte del nostro team come Quality Analyst nel mercato farmaceutico!
In ruolo di Quality Analyst presso Transcom, nel settore farmaceutico, sarai responsabile di garantire che la qualità dei nostri servizi  rispetti  i più alti standard del settore. Il tuo ruolo avrà un impatto diretto sull’esperienza dei clienti  che entrano in contatto  i con i più importanti brand farmaceutici.
Le tue responsabilità
:
Valutare le comunicazioni del servizio clienti (chiamate, email e chat) per assicurarsi che rispettino gli standard di qualità del settore farmaceutico;
Fornire feedback costruttivi agli agenti e ai team per aiutarli a migliorare le performance e rispettare gli standard di qualità. Partecipare alle sessioni di coaching per sviluppare le competenze e migliorare le performance;
Creare report di qualità per monitorare le performance e individuare aree di miglioramento;
Collaborare con i team e i manager per definire standard e procedure di qualità per il settore farmaceutico.
Cosa offriamo per te?
Avrai un ruolo chiave nel garantire il mantenimento degli standard di qualità richiesti dai nostri clienti, assicurando esperienze positive in tutte le occasioni;

title: Real Time Analyst - Davao, Philippines
description_text:
General Information
Location
Davao
Job ID
9080
Job Category
Operations
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is looking for talented individuals like you to join our awesome team! Be the next
Real Time Analyst
for our Transcom Davao
site.
Join our Transcom Family as a Real-Time Analyst!
As a Workforce Management
Real Time Analyst
, you will manage all call center traffic to ensure compliance with customer service level agreements. This will include - serving as the call traffic and trending analyst for the assigned operations, providing real-time and historical call center data to internal and external audiences, and working with call center supervisors and managers. In addition, you will analyze trends within assigned operations, not limited to call volumes, call patterns, staff productivity, performance trends, shrinkages, and resource allocation. This position will use the results of these analyses to adjust forecasted intraday call volume, AHT, and staffing, and apply the necessary action plans and strategies to address anticipated gaps.
Essential Duties & Responsibilities:
Real-Time Queue Management
Assists and directs the day-to-day call traffic to service centers, assuring that service level agreements are consistently met.
Conducts load-balancing through skill skill-based routing system.
Works with the assigned operations management team in adhering to the planned schedules and activities, implementing action plans aimed to alleviate ongoing and anticipated challenges.
Partners with the assigned operations department in coming up with real-time action plans needed to mitigate the ongoing challenges and works with the team in the proper execution of the tasks at hand.
Implements and supports a standardized call center staffing model, as well as makes recommendations, and adjustments, and serves as a key analyst for staffing questions for management.
Communication
Provides real-time analysis around productivity-impacting scenarios to customers to enable them to make timely decisions about offline activities and outages
Assists with staffing requirement analysis and scheduling of staff to ensure contractual service levels are always met and communicates the plan to the assigned operations management.
Provides ongoing internal communications with call center staff and management on load balancing and staffing requirements in real-time, historically, and proactively.
Performs analysis to support call trending and tracking of call volumes used to assist in staffing decisions.
Acts as the focal point between the client workforce management team and the assigned operations management.
Participates in and contributes to performance improvement activities.
Real Time Reporting
Establishes and maintains an appropriate level of call center reporting to key stakeholders. This includes but is not limited to real-time and historical reporting on call volumes, staffing, and historical call trends. Establishes these reporting procedures and becomes a central repository of call center data.
Assists operations leaders with ad-hoc reports detailing performance outputs and/or challenges.
Participates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.
Outage Escalation and Management
Gathers relevant information on technical issues and communicates with the appropriate support departments.
Communicate the outage or issue to the supported client counterparts until the resolution
What we are looking for:
To be successful in this role you must…
Preferably a college graduate, or at least with a secondary school diploma.
At least 3 years of related contact center experience.
Minimum of 1 year traffic management experience in a complex skills-based routing environment, for external candidates.
For internal candidates, must at least have 1 year of tenure with Transcom, and no issued PDs.
Good understanding of basic contact center metrics and overall contact center operations (applicable to external candidates)
Can articulate performance metrics and calculations such as, but not limited to, Service Level, Staffing Adherence, Avg Handle Time, Avg Speed of Answer, etc. (applicable to external candidates)
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
What's in it for YOU
Driven by our "Malasakit" culture, we make certain that our team members are well-cared for. Hence we are providing these employee benefits, which you'll be able to utilize once you join our team!
Day 1 HMO
Meal & Transportation Allowance
Rice Subsidy
Clothing Allowance
24/7 Teleconsult
Free Psychologist Consultation
In-house & Online Pharmacy
Scholarship Program
Retirement Fund
Free Meal & Medicine (through Transcom’s Tap Card Rewards)
Loyalty Incentives
Accidental & Life Insurance
Free Shuttle Service
What Life at Transcom is like
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed to our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
We are highly driven by our "Malasakit" culture. Transcom, in its very core, is all about an inclusive team that is focused on people. It all comes down to setting the bar for dignity, equality, and respect. It means that each one takes part in proactively shaping, cultivating, and building the company we want to work and live in. This is why genuine concern is so vital to us.

title: Scheduling Analyst - Manila, Philippines
description_text:
General Information
Location
Pasig Ayala 30th
Job ID
8098
Job Category
Operations
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is looking for talented individuals like you to join our awesome team! Be the next
Scheduling Analyst
for our Transcom
Pasig
site.
Join our Transcom Family as a Scheduling Analyst!
This position will be responsible for maintaining optimized and accurate schedules as well as system and roster maintenance. They will support and create short terms plans based on their analysis and recommendations from the Long Term Strategic Planners. Will provide guidance to the Real Time Analysis team ensuring all pre planned activities are met and optimized. Responsible for a minimum 1-week look ahead for short term planning and schedule management.
Essential Duties & Responsibilities:
Scheduling Governance
- Responsible for creating, maintaining, processing, accommodating and managing schedule bids, adjustments, assignments and swaps for all future weeks.
- Generates, presents and publishes Intraday Performance files for RTA and operations guidance and provides recommendations to address projected over and understaffing after optimization
- Initiates, facilitates, recommends, analyze and evaluate shift bids and it’s results
- Pre plots off phone activities as agreed upon on capacity calls and provide support for operations initiatives
- Vacation leave tracker/calendar maintenance and governance
Roster and System Management and Maintenance
- Maintains and publishes campaign’s official master roster for scheduling, capacity planning and other purposes
- eWFM, CMS and all WFM related system profile creation, maintenance and providing the correct security profiles/accesses
- Aligns master roster file, eWFM and SAP roster and ensure all statuses and information are correct and accurate
Teamwork and Collaboration
- Maintains an open communication with all departments ensuring all WFM impacting and related initiatives are supported and properly guided
- Provides guidance and coordination with the real-time team to ensure plans and initiatives are being driven and followed through
- Act as Scheduling Assistant Manager/Manager/Senior Manager back up and campaign Point of Contact in absence of the functional leaders
Customer Focus (Client):
- Assists in defining, managing and achieving client required performance objectives
- Consistently demonstrates sound judgment
- Researches, develops and implements operational and technical processes.
- Conducts analyses, prepares reports and communicates with internal clients to provide value-added and consultative services.
Customer Focus (Operations):
- Performs appropriate updates to documentation and develops operational support policies and procedures to ensure appropriate updates are made. Leads and coordinates intra and interdepartmental process changes.
- Achieve and deliver all commitments made to Operations Leadership team
- Maintains quality assurance processes that ensure customer disclosure of issues that directly impact services. Maintains staffing and program ratios based on established targets.
- Acts as a program resource during new projects or ramps, and will engage appropriate resources as needed.
Communication:
- Provides effective communication and feedback to staff
- Prepares and presents both written and verbal communication to clients and colleagues alike
- Is able to communicate effectively regarding Transcom and projects at a short notice and under pressure
Campaign Performance Management
- Supports the overall performance of the program as aligned to the financial, servicing, and delivery targets on a short term planning perspective
- Ensure that schedules are published on time or provide the necessary communications on delays and turnaround time
- Drives consistency with adherence to WFM SOP
What we are looking for:
To be successful in this role you must…
Educational Background:
University degree or equivalent higher qualification
Work Experience:
- Minimum 1 year experience in forecasting and scheduling preferably using Excel and Erlang.
- Minimum of 2 years as a real time analyst managing and supporting a campaign
- System Knowledge Requirement: extensive background in RTA and scheduling in at least 2 WFM System (eWFM, Verint, IEX, Teleopti, Genesys)
- Additional Requirements: extensive knowledge and experience in schedule and roster management and supporting more than 2 lines of businesses or 2 sets of IDPs with different KPI requirements.
Skills Requirements:
- Strong skills in using Excel to create and maintain historical data and forecasting models.
- Applied knowledge of predictive statistics will be a strong advantage.
- Knowledge of inbound call center environment is preferred.
- Actuarial/Statistics/Math background will be an advantage.
What's in it for YOU!
Driven by our "Malasakit" culture, we make certain that our team members are well-cared for. Hence we are proving these employee benefits, which you'll be able to utilize once you join our team!
Day 1 HMO
Meal & Transportation Allowance
Rice Subsidy
Clothing Allowance
24/7 Teleconsult
Free Psychologist Consultation
In-house & Online Pharmacy
Scholarship Program
Retirement Fund
Free Meal & Medicine (through Transcom’s Tap Card Rewards)
Loyalty Incentives
Accidental & Life Insurance
Free Shuttle Service
What Life at Transcom is like!
Transcom is a firm believer in putting people first. We have cultivated a culture of focusing on and caring for our employees, ensuring that they are provided with rewards, privileges, and amenities that are relevant, valuable, and easily available.
We are highly driven by our "Malasakit" culture. Transcom, in its very core, is all about an inclusive team that is focused on people. It all comes down to setting the bar for dignity, equality, and respect. It means that each one takes part in proactively shaping, cultivating, and building the company we want to work and live in. This is why genuine concern is so vital to us.

title: Specialist za podporo strankam v italijanskem jeziku
description_text:
General Information
Location
Work at Home
Job ID
8552
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Italian
Description & requirements
Description
Dobro govoriš in razumeš italijanski jezik in se dobro znajdeš v pogovoru z ljudmi? Meniš, da je danes za zdravje pomembno veliko več kot le jemanje zdravila? Potem si prava oseba za nas! Vabimo te, da se pridružiš naši ponosni ekipi sodelavcev po vsej Evropi na projektu, ki nudi podporo strankam v
italijanščini
po telefonu in/ali e-pošti s poizvedbami o njihovih zdravstvenih težavah.
Nudimo ti:
Redno plačilo - bruto 1350 eur!
Pogodba za nedoločen čas s poskusnim delom 6 mesecev
Plačano usposabljanje
100% delo od doma
Vsakodneva podpora pri delu
Ugodna in prijateljska delovna atmosfera
Možnost napredovanja
Pridruži se nam kot specialist za podporo strankam v italijanskem jeziku!
Postani del te fantastične ekipe, ki je osredotočena na iskanje novih načinov zdravljenja in diagnostike, ki razvijajo medicinsko prakso in pomagajo pacientom, da živijo dlje in bolje. Tvoje naloge bodo:
Nudenje podpore strankam prek več komunikacijskih kanalov (klici, chat, e-pošta)
Delo boš začel s treningom na katerem boš spoznal celotni sistem in procese
Nudil/a boš podporo strankam, rešitve in pravočasno odgovarjal/a na vsa vprašanja, ki jih zastavlja stranka
Vsak dan boš lahko komuniciral/a v italijanskem jeziku
Imel/a boš stalno podporo celotne ekipe in Vodje skupine
Kaj iščemo?
Napredno govorno in pisno znanje italijanskega jezika, C1 raven (obvezno)
Napredno govorno in pisno znanje angleškega jezika, min B2 raven (obvezno)
Razpoložljivost za delo 5 dni v tednu vključno s soboto in nedeljo
Dobro računalniško znanje (obvezno)
Empatija
Dobre komunikacijske sposobnosti
Osredotočenost na stranke in reševanje problemov
Sposobnost dobrega organiziranja in doseganja ciljev
Kakšno je življenje v Transcomu!
V Transcomu smo neizprosno predani. Svojim strankam in drug drugemu. Vsak dan nekdo začne svojo pot v Transcomu. Svoj današnji potencial spreminjaš v veščine za prihodnost. Prejemaš priznanja za trdo delo, ekipni duh in podporo drugim. Uvajaš pozitivne, trajne spremembe v svoji ekipi in skupnosti. Takšni pač smo v Transcomu. Tukaj nam je mar drug za drugega in navijamo drug za drugega. Vključen/a si točno takšen/na, kot si, že od prvega dne. In s pravim razmišljanjem ni meja temu, kako daleč lahko pridemo skupaj.

metadata.Description: Dobro govoriš in razumeš italijanski jezik in se dobro znajdeš v pogovoru z ljudmi? Meniš, da je danes za zdravje pomembno veliko več kot le jemanje zdravila? Potem si prava oseba za nas! Vabimo te, da se pridružiš naši ponosni ekipi sodelavcev po vsej Evropi na projektu, ki nudi podporo strankam v italijanščini po telefonu in/ali e-pošti s poizvedbami o njihovih zdravstvenih težavah. Nudimo ti: Redno plačilo - bruto 1350 eur! Pogodba za nedoločen čas s poskusnim delom 6 mesecev Plačano usposabljanje 100% delo od doma Vsakodneva podpora pri delu Ugodna in prijateljska delovna atmosfera Možnost napredovanja Pridruži se nam kot specialist za podporo strankam v italijanskem jeziku! Postani del te fantastične ekipe, ki je osredotočena na iskanje novih načinov zdravljenja in diagnostike, ki razvijajo medicinsko prakso in pomagajo pacientom, da živijo dlje in bolje. Tvoje naloge bodo: Nudenje podpore strankam prek več komunikacijskih kanalov (klici, chat, e-pošta) Delo boš začel s treningom na katerem boš spoznal celotni sistem in procese Nudil/a boš podporo strankam, rešitve in pravočasno odgovarjal/a na vsa vprašanja, ki jih zastavlja stranka Vsak dan boš lahko komuniciral/a v italijanskem jeziku Imel/a boš stalno podporo celotne ekipe in Vodje skupine Kaj iščemo? Napredno govorno in pisno znanje italijanskega jezika, C1 raven (obvezno) Napredno govorno in pisno znanje angleškega jezika, min B2 raven (obvezno) Razpoložljivost za delo 5 dni v tednu vključno s soboto in nedeljo Dobro računalniško znanje (obvezno) Empatija Dobre komunikacijske sposobnosti Osredotočenost na stranke in reševanje problemov Sposobnost dobrega organiziranja in doseganja ciljev Kakšno je življenje v Transcomu! V Transcomu smo neizprosno predani. Svojim strankam in drug drugemu. Vsak dan nekdo začne svojo pot v Transcomu. Svoj današnji potencial spreminjaš v veščine za prihodnost. Prejemaš priznanja za trdo delo, ekipni duh in podporo drugim. Uvajaš pozitivne, trajne spremembe v svoji ekipi in skupnosti. Takšni pač smo v Transcomu. Tukaj nam je mar drug za drugega in navijamo drug za drugega. Vključen/a si točno takšen/na, kot si, že od prvega dne. In s pravim razmišljanjem ni meja temu, kako daleč lahko pridemo skupaj.

title: Specjalista ds. obsługi klienta – rynek polski
description_text:
General Information
Location
Porto

9599
Job Category

Description & requirements
Description
Czy pomaganie innym leży w Twojej naturze? Szukamy polskojęzycznego Specjalisty ds. obsługi klienta z analitycznym podejściem do rozwiązywania problemów, który dołączy do społeczności ekspertów customer experience.
Chcesz być jednym z nas? Aplikuj już teraz i rozpocznij z Transcom coś wyjątkowego!
Co zyskujesz?
Możliwość stałego zatrudnienia z atrakcyjnym wynagrodzeniem oraz systemem premiowym
Płatne szkolenie wdrożeniowe oraz codzienne wsparcie
Międzynarodowe i inkluzywne środowisko pracy, w którym od pierwszego dnia poczujesz się wspierany/a, doceniony/a i mile widziany/a
Ciągły rozwój dzięki wewnętrznym platformom szkoleniowym oraz szkoleniom zewnętrznym
Możliwości awansu w strukturach Transcom – ponad 80% stanowisk managerskich obsadzamy wewnętrznie
Dołącz do Transcom jako Specjalista ds. obsługi klienta na rynek polski!
Będziesz na pierwszej linii wsparcia klientów, realnie wpływając na funkcjonowanie firmy. W tej roli będziesz:
Zapewniać obsługę klienta B2B i B2C za pośrednictwem różnych kanałów
Głównie rozwiązywać zgłoszenia poprzez połączenia przychodzące
Wykonywać zadania back office’owe, w tym odpowiadać na e-maile i czaty oraz pracować w wewnętrznych systemach
Udzielać wsparcia dla wielu produktów na różnych rynkach
Czego od Ciebie oczekujemy?
Bardzo dobrej znajomości języka polskiego (C1 lub poziom ojczysty) w mowie i piśmie
Znajomości języka angielskiego na poziomie co najmniej B2 (w mowie i piśmie)
Dyspozycyjności do pracy 5 dni w tygodniu (również w soboty i niedziele)
Gotowości do pracy zmianowej w systemie 24/7
Dobrej obsługi komputera
Umiejętności okazywania empatii w komunikacji pisemnej
Analitycznego myślenia i zdolności diagnozowania oraz rozwiązywania problemów
Umiejętności zarządzania czasem i realizacji wyznaczonych celów
Jak wygląda praca w Transcom?
W Transcom jesteśmy nieustannie zaangażowani w relacje między sobą i naszymi klientami. Każdego dnia ktoś nowy zaczyna z nami przygodę i wykorzystuje swój potencjał, przekształcając go w umiejętności przyszłości. Doceniamy ciężką pracę, grę zespołową i wzajemną pomoc, wspieramy pozytywne i trwałe zmiany. Tacy właśnie jesteśmy, dbamy o siebie i od samego początku sobie kibicujemy, a przy odpowiednim nastawieniu nie ma przed nami ograniczeń i możemy zajść naprawdę daleko.

title: Sr. Manager for Trust and Safety Practice/Operations Excellence - Manila, Philippines
description_text:
General Information
Location
Pasig- Tiendesitas
Job ID
8572
Job Category
Operations Leadership
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Transcom is looking for talented individual like you to join our awesome team. Be a Senior Manager, Trust and Safety Practice/Operations Excellence in Transcom!
Join our Transcom Family as a
Senior Manager, Trust and Safety Practice/Operations Excellence
!
Mission:
Effective advisory to our clients helping them drive their platform’s safety by collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and execute strategies against threats like self-harm, graphic violence, and hateful activities
A
Senior Manager, Trust and Safety Practice is responsible for managing safety risk frameworks, designing intake processes, analyzing data to improve safety tools, collaborating with product and engineering (at client side) to integrate safety into development, and ensuring policy enforcement across teams
Functional Responsibilities:
• Strategy & Roadmap: Play a pivotal role towards the strategy, roadmap, and execution of initiatives to address critical safety issues and harmful content
• Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work with product, engineering, legal, policy, and operations teams (client side and internal) to align safety goals and integrate safety measures into the product development/re-engineering lifecycle
• Risk Management: Develop and manage frameworks and processes to assess, monitor, and mitigate trust and safety risks
• Program & Project Management: Own and deliver end-to-end programs focused on specific harm areas, ensuring timely delivery and effective execution
• Data Analysis: Analyze data to provide insights and support the enhancement of detection, moderation, and analytics tools
• Policy Enforcement: Partner with relevant teams to ensure consistent and scaled enforcement of trust and safety policies
• Process Improvement: Document processes and drive continuous improvement to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of trust and safety operations
Technical Responsibilities:
• Ensures confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information critical to fulfilling the organization’s business functions
• Remain compliant with the relevant business regulatory requirements
What we are looking for:
To be successful in this role you must…
Preferably a university graduate (external), or at least with a secondary school diploma
Preferably a Green Belt or Black Belt certified
Has excellent communication skills
Someone who has an Intermediate/High-level Knowledge of Excel, Word, and Powerpoint (Gsuite)
Minimum 3+ proven experience in Trust & Safety field would be preferred
Minimum 3+ proven experience in leadership position/s would be preferred
Proven experience in coordinating multiple engagements at the same time
Proven experience in coordinating multiple engagements at the same time.
Experience with Lean, Six Sigma, COPC, or similar continuous improvement methodologies.
Familiarity with labor laws, compliance standards, and risk management as it pertains to Operational Management
Background in customer service, contact centers, or related operational environments.
Skills profile and required levels (core competencies):
• Proven experience in program or project management, preferably in the Trust & Safety domain
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to analyze data and provide insights
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills to collaborate effectively across various internal teams
• Deep understanding of product management and the ability to align Trust & Safety priorities with broader platform goals
• Familiarity with machine learning (ML) models and their performance measurement is a plus
Motivational aspects
• Flexible, ability to adapt quickly to change
• Must have good organization and time management skills
• Be inspiring and enthusiastic
• Be influential and prepared to make decisions to optimize business performance and to be able to see the connection to commercial terms
• Able to deal with difficult situations & conflicts
• Motivated by analytical and systematic work, with a predisposition for team management and interdepartmental coordination
• Remain motivated and keep a positive attitude under pressure
What's in it for YOU!
Driven by our "Malasakit" culture, we make certain that our team members are well-cared for. Hence we are providing these employee benefits, which you'll be able to utilize once you join our team!
Day 1 HMO
Meal & Transportation Allowance
Rice Subsidy
Clothing Allowance
24/7 Teleconsult
Free Psychologist Consultation
In-house & Online Pharmacy
Scholarship Program
Retirement Fund
Free Meal & Medicine (through Transcom’s Tap Card Rewards)
Loyalty Incentives
Accidental & Life Insurance
Free Shuttle Service
What Life at Transcom is like!
At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed to our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. Taking the potential they have today, and turning it into skills for the future. Getting recognized for working hard, being a team player, and supporting others. Championing positive, lasting change in their teams and communities. That’s just how we are at Transcom. Here we care, and root for each other. You’re included, just as you are, from day one. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.
We are highly driven by our "Malasakit" culture. Transcom, in its very core, is all about an inclusive team that is focused on people. It all comes down to setting the bar for dignity, equality, and respect. It means that each one takes part in proactively shaping, cultivating, and building the company we want to work and live in. This is why genuine concern is so vital to us.

title: Stručnjak za komunikaciju sa klijentima u oblasti online bankarstva (italijanski jezik)
description_text:
General Information
Location
Niš
Job ID
9577
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Italian
Description & requirements
Description
Poveži svoje znanje italijanskog jezika sa karijerom u online bankarstvu!
Na ovoj poziciji imaćeš priliku da stekneš uvid u ključne procese savremenih finansijskih usluga – od korisničke podrške, preko analize zahteva za kredit, do donošenja odluka o prihvatanju korisnika. Ovo je idealna prilika za razvoj u digitalnom okruženju i rad u stabilnoj internacionalnoj kompaniji!
Šta možeš da očekuješ od prvog dana angažovanja:
Početna obuka i podrška:
Osiguravamo da svaki novi član tima dobije sve potrebne alate i znanje kako bi se uspešno integrisao i ostvarivao željene rezultate.
Ugovor:
Ugovor o radu počinje od prvog dana obuke
Rad od kuće:
Nakon 3 nedelje rada iz kancelarije, prelaziš na rad od kuće
Neradni vikendi:
Linije za klijente su otvorene od
08-20h
, od ponedeljka do petka
Važno nam je da si dobro:
Privatno zdravstveno osiguranje je dostupno svim našim zaposlenima
Nagrađivanje:
Tvoj trud i doprinos bit će prepoznati i nagrađeni. Osim redovne plate, imaćeš priliku da ostvaruješ dodatne mesešne bonuse
Bonus za preporuku:
Preporuči svog prijatelja i dobićeš bonus ukoliko ga/je zaposlimo
Bonus dobrodošlice:
u iznosu od
3
00
eur
Working mom program:
obuhvata fleksibilno radno vreme za mame koje imaju decu do 7 godina
Pridruži nam se kao Stručnjak za komunikaciju sa klijentima u oblasti online bankarstva (italijanski jezik)!
Bićeš zadužen/a za pružanje tačnih i blagovremenih informacija korisnicima u vezi sa:
Stanjem računa i raspoloživim sredstvima na platnim karticama
Izmenom ličnih podataka klijenata
Aktivacijom i blokadom platnih kartica
Praćenjem i evidentiranjem promena na računima
Ponovnim slanjem kartica i PIN brojeva
Proverom sumnjivih transakcija na osnovu sigurnosnih parametara
Informisanjem o postojećim dugovanjima
Obradom i rešavanjem reklamacija
Kako da znaš da si prava osoba za naš tim?
Veoma dobro govoriš i pišeš na italijanskom jeziku (minimum nivo B2)
Imaš osnovno znanje engleskog jezika
Motivisan/a si da dodatno unaprediš svoje jezičke veštine
Pokazuješ interesovanje za ekonomske i bankarske teme
Vešto koristiš računar i brzo se snalaziš u digitalnom okruženju
Komunikativna si osoba koja uživa u pomaganju drugima
Voliš timski rad i doprinosiš pozitivnoj atmosferi u kolektivu
Kako izgleda život u Transcomu?
U Transcomu smo neumorno posvećeni. Našim klijentima i jedni drugima. Svakog dana neko započne svoje putovanje sa Transcomom. Uzimajući potencijal koji imaju danas i pretvarajući ga u veštine za budućnost. Dobijanje priznanja za naporan rad, timskog igrača i podršku drugima. Zagovaranje pozitivnih, trajnih promena u svojim timovima i zajednicama. Takvi smo mi u Transcomu. Ovde nam je stalo, i navijamo jedni za druge. Uključeni ste, baš takvi kakvi jeste, od prvog dana. A sa pravim načinom razmišljanja, nema granice koliko daleko možemo ići zajedno.

Just nu letar vi inte aktivt efter nya kollegor; dock välkomnar vi spontana ansökningar från motiverade kandidater.
Genom att skicka in din ansökan godkänner du att vi säkert sparar din profil i vår databas. Skulle det komma upp en lämplig tjänst i framtiden som matchar dina kunskaper och erfarenheter, kontaktar vi dig.
Vad vi kan erbjuda DIG!
Betald utbildning
Våra scheman kommer att variera från projekt till projekt, föredrar du ett fast schema eller ett flexibelt - vi har något som passar just dig!
En ambitiös och trygg arbetsgivare med långsiktiga mål
Företagsförmåner
Tillväxtmöjligheter: Mer än 60 % av våra högre roller fylls av tidigare agenter. När en ny möjlighet dyker upp delar vi den med vårt nätverk först.
Gå med i vår Transcom-familj som Kundtjänstrepresentant!
Du kommer att arbeta för våra kunder och leverera förstklassig service. För att passa i rollen som kundtjänstmedarbetare söker vi någon som är lösningsorienterad, empatisk och ödmjuk. På Transcom arbetar vi för att leverera utmärkt kundservice alla dagar i veckan och alltid ge kunden det lilla extra.

Behärskar både svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.

Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med 2 månaders provanställning

Lösningsorienterad och flexibel, vill vi att alla våra kunder ska känna sig väl omhändertagna och att vi alltid kan ge dem den bästa lösningen

Transcom är en global specialist på kundservice och kundnöjdhet genom vårt omfattande nätverk av 90+ kontaktcenter i 29 länder, på 33 språk. title: Svensktalande kundtjänstrepresentant för Nespresso
description_text:
General Information
Location
Málaga
Job ID
9929
Job Category
Customer Service Representative (CSR)
Language Requirement
Swedish
Description & requirements
Description
Motiveras du av att ge utmärkt kundservice? Då har vi den perfekta möjligheten för dig i soliga Benalmádena, Spanien!
Bli
kundtjänstmedarbetare för Nespresso
- ett välkänt varumärke av hög kvalitet. Nespresso är en av marknadsledarna inom kaffe och erbjuder ett brett utbud av kaffekapslar, maskiner och tillbehör internationellt. Vi söker personer med en passion för kaffe som vill bli en del av vårt team!
Vad kan vi erbjuda DIG!
* Tillsvidareanställning med fast lön
* Stöd och hjälp med flytt
* Två dagars semester per månad
* Utbildning i kundtjänst
* Karriärmöjligheter
* Internationell, inkluderande arbetsmiljö
* Förmåner som spanskalektioner, gratis kaffe etc.
* Branschrabatter på ett brett utbud av produkter; bilar, flyg, möbler och inredning, fritidsaktiviteter, mode etc.
Bli kundtjänstmedarbetare!
Vi hjälper våra kunder via telefon, chatt, sociala medier och e-post. Dina huvuduppgifter blir att svara på frågor och hitta lösningar på problem relaterade till beställning, leverans, betalning och felsökning av kaffemaskiner.
För att passa rollen som kundtjänstmedarbetare måste du vara anpassningsbar och lösningsorienterad.
Vad söker vi?
* Du är redo för ett nytt äventyr och kan börja den 19 november 2025.
* Du har goda kunskaper i svenska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
* Du har avancerade kunskaper i engelska.
* Du har en positiv attityd och vill ge utmärkt service.
* Du är bekväm med telefonen som ett arbetsverktyg.
* Du är villig att ge utmärkt service till flera kunder samtidigt.
Hur är livet på Transcom:
På Transcom är vi obevekligt engagerade. För våra kunder och för varandra. Varje dag börjar någon sin resa med Transcom. Att ta den potential de har idag och omvandla den till färdigheter för framtiden. Att bli erkänd för att arbeta hårt, vara en lagspelare och stödja andra. Att driva positiv, varaktig förändring inom ditt team och din gemenskap. Det är bara så vi är på Transcom. Här bryr vi oss om och uppmuntrar varandra. Du är inkluderad, precis som du är, från dag ett. Och med rätt inställning finns det ingen gräns för hur långt vi kan nå tillsammans.
Om den här tjänsten intresserar dig - ansök idag så återkommer vi till dig med mer information.
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
“We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.”

Description
Transcom is all about people, and we're looking for a
Talent Acquisition Partner in Malaga
to attract top talent and drive our hiring success. In this role, you'll collaborate with teams, manage the end-to-end recruitment process, and ensure we hire the best to deliver exceptional results. If finding and nurturing talent excites you, apply now!
Join Transcom as a Talent Acquisition Partner!
Be on the front line of support for our teams and deliver impactful work on a company level. In this role, you will:
* Take ownership of end-to-end recruitment, from job ad creation and selection of candidates to conducting interviews and assessments.
* Manage the offer and on-boarding stages for new hires.
* Identify relevant sourcing channels, mainly for roles within German, Dutch, and Nordic speaking customer service in Iberia.
* Work hands-on to improve candidate touchpoints by refining recruitment tools and processes.
* Strengthen our employer brand through internal and external channels to attract Transcom's most valuable assets—our people!
* Ensure recruitment needs are fulfilled within the SLAs and deadlines.
* Develop and maintain relations with stakeholders across functions and geographies while providing support to other locations within Europe.
What's in it for you:
* International and inclusive environment that makes you feel supported, encouraged, and welcome from day one.
* Continuous development through our internal learning platforms and external training.
* Opportunities to grow within a diverse community that prioritizes fun, balance, trust, and transparency.
* Full ownership and responsibility of your Talent Acquisition tasks in your area of responsibility.
* Flexibility with a focus on life-work balance and a hybrid work model.
* Being part of a team based across Malaga, Alicante and Barcelona.
What we are looking for:
To be successful in this role, the following is needed:
* Experience: At least one year of experience in end-to-end recruitment.
* Language Skills: Fluency in English plus one of the following: German, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish or Danish. Fluent Spanish is a plus.
* Communication: Strong verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills, such as empathy and listening.
* Adaptability: The ability to thrive when working across cultures and nationalities while adapting to requirements in various locations.
* Digital Mindset: A good understanding of recruitment systems, social media, and tools.
* Diversity Advocate: A commitment to providing support and challenging hiring decisions to secure diversity in recruitment.
*
Previous TA-related experience is a plus.

At Transcom, we’re relentlessly committed. To our clients and each other. Every day, someone starts their journey with Transcom. And with the right mindset, there’s no end to how far we can go together.

description_text:
General Information
Location
Porto
Job ID
8667
Job Category
Operations
Language Requirement
English
Description & requirements
Description
Are you passionate about leading a team and delivering exceptional results?
We are seeking a dedicated Team Leader to join us in the English market.
If you excel in a leadership role, thrive in a collaborative environment, and are committed to fostering a culture of excellence, what are you waiting for?
Join us and play a crucial role in enhancing the customer experience while leading a dynamic team.
What’s in it for you?
Permanent full-time contract with attractive salary;
Vacation and holiday bonuses - twice a year or divided monthly you will receive an additional bonus related to each month of work;
Language bonus - you will work in an international market which gives you an additional bonus related to the language associated with.
Employee referral program - you will receive an additional bonus for every personal referral;
Additional benefits like discounts in many store chains.
Join us as a Team Leader!
As a Team Leader, you will be largely responsible and driving the many aspects of the business while working either in the capacity of a Manager, a Leader or a Coach. On a daily basis you are involved in impacting the positive coaching and development of your team, and driving the business operational needs.
Be the crucial key to our team's success. As a team leader your mission will be:
Provide precise information to generate the earnings and growth forecast;
Notify, guarantee and monitor the operating targets assigned to each of the agents forming the team;
Act in line with the guidelines set by the Company giving an example to the remaining employees;
Respond proactively to the variations in the established service levels and targets, with smooth communication to the team to achieve adequate adaptation;
Meet and exceed the targets set by each service, review and assess the performance reports and promoting specific measures to attain such targets;
Ensure that CSRs are familiar with the targets. Attend internal meetings to optimize service operations or the services of their area of responsibility;
Support RTM in controlling the traffic, to adapt the distribution of tasks within the team in line with service levels;
Prepare reports on the evolution of your team’s performance in relation to results and the service quality offered;
Advise the team on their on-going professional development, motivate and lead the work team.
What are we looking for:
Native or fluent in English (C1 or plus)
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Excellent problem solving skills and attention to detail
Ability to manage and motivate a team
Proven experience in a customer service in the pharmaceutical industry
Proven experience in a leadership role within a customer service environment is a plus
What is life like at Transcom?
Transcom is a global multinational customer experience specialist providing consulting, customer service, sales, technical support and collections services through our extensive network of contact centers and remote agents.
We are 30 000 customer experience specialists in over 69 contact centers in 26 countries, providing services in 33 languages to global brands in a variety of industries. Transcom is a company committed to equal opportunities between men and women.
At Transcom, we are strongly committed to our customers and to our team. Every day, someone starts his or her journey with Transcom, harnessing the current potential and transforming it into skills for the future. We are recognized for working hard, for working as a team, and for supporting each other.
We are Transcom - there is no limit to how far we can go together.
